story:
Pachamama Debut Cd

Molweni!

Although classically trained,  I have always known the importance and richness of the African cultural musical heritage.  Known as the "rainbow nation" South Africa has a diversity of cultures and languages (officially having 11 languages) and as a result is rich in musical resources. Usually, African music is passed on from generation to generation orally.  However, due to this tradition there is a fear that the African music may become extinct because, the music has not been preserved or written down, only passed down orally from generation to generation. Therefore it is important for African music to be preserved. (If you want to read more about this, you can look at an article I presented at the 2013 2nd Annual international Arts based research and Artistic research conference in Granada, Spain. 

http://art2investigacion en.weebly.com/uploads/2/1/1/7/21177240/swarts_tarynne.pdf 

Being abroad I have also realized how important it is to preserve the cultural musical heritage of South Africa. South African music has something unique to offer the world of music . Being in Europe I see myself as a cultural bridge between Africa and Europe which allows me to take the best of both worlds and create something new. The three main benefits of the recording of this CD are:

1.  The recording of the music itself, implies that it will be preserved for future generations.  

2. Certain African rhythms will be preserved:for example in my song Mbaqanga

3. This CD hopes to educate the world about African music which up to this point has not been as largely investigated or studied in comparison to other musical genres. 

As a songwriter my style of composing is a hybrid  between Soul and African music. I beleve I will be offering something new and unique to the music market.With this Crowd funding campaign, our objective is to raise 7890 euros, in order to record a professional Cd at Escenario Estudios in Alcala, Spain.  We have already recorded a demo in Nomadas Studios, in Andalucía, Spain featuring 4 of my own original songs. You can hear a sample of these songs on sound cloud. This demo features a Senegalese drummer and a Spanish Bassist named Edu Armiño.  We have also created a professional website with, Invoca studio in Siles, Jaen. With this Crowd funding campaign,  we are planning to record a professional CD adding 7 more songs.  We have already reached the halfway mark.  The songs we have already recorded are listed as follows:


1.  "Aphrodite"

2.  "Namhlanje"

3.  "Someday"


The song Namhlanje  is a song, which is a fusion between different styles. It also uses African rhythms. The title Namhlanje , means Today , translated into IsiXhosa, an indigenous South African language.  It is a song about hope and fighting for your dreams .  We are also planning to record a live music video for this song.

The song Aphrodite is one of my personal favorite songs. All the songs have a special place in my heart but certain songs tend to capture a moment or an emotion that cannot be put into words. It talks about the power of a woman and the love of a woman comparing her to the Greek Goddess Aphrodite.  My favorite phrase in the song is, She’s so mighty like Aphrodite :)

Another song, which we have not recorded yet, but we plan to record, is a song called Mbaqanga. Mbaqanga is a style of music and dance in South Africa.  This song really captures the spirit of South Africa. It gives that Ubuntu feel of being in a South African township and enjoying the sense of community. A township is similar to a "favela". This song utilizes the African rhythms and beats of Mbaqanga.  In the near future, my team and I would like to go to South Africa, to record this song, in Africa in the Townships with South African musicians.

Although our  main objective is to raise the 7890 euros to record a professional CD, this campaign to me means more than recording a CD. We would like to bring awareness to musical educational programs in Africa and we would like to donate a small percentage to an Ngo named Agua de Coco, who have established a co-curricular  activity in Madagascar to promote Musical Education programs to young children and also to give children a safe haven to go to after school, to keep them off the streets.

I believe that music unites, educates and brings people together and this is the ideology that my music hopes to achieve. We should all raise our awareness of important issues in the world and I believe the most important place to start is through Education.  As the late Tata Nelson Mandela said ¨Education is the most powerful weapon, which you can use to change the world¨

story:
Short Summary

Hi everyone, I am Naomi K, an Australian/Dutch Singer Songwriter & Actor, living in Los Angeles! Music has been my passion for as long as I can remember, and after being in a few bands that could never quite get it together, I decided to take a leap of faith and 3 years ago I officially became a solo artist!! 

I've been Number 1 on the Reverbnation (the new and improved version of MySpace) Singer Songwriter charts for over a year now. I've won various music awards and have had some amazing reviews in a number of music publications too. 

I have also just been accepted into the iStandard ‘iWrite’ Songwriter Showcase, LA Edition. It's supported by ASCAP, and i'm one of only 14 Singer Songwriters selected!! Judges include Lex Borerro – (1916 MGMT, Universal Music Group, credits with Maroon 5, Rihanna, Pitbull, Big Sean, Flo Rida, Justin Beiber, Chris Brown, Meek Mill & more), The Frontrunnaz – (Writing duo, Logic, Ray J, Ryan Leslie, Mobb Deep, Redrama & more), and Brandon Kitchen –  (A&R Disney, Grammy Winning Songwriter)  

A link to the event is below, and I will update you all on it's outcome once it's taken place. 

http://istandardproducers.com/events/iwritela91415/

I've been fortunate enough to cultivate an amazing supportive fan-base of friends and fellow musicians from all over the world, all of which have collectively helped inspire me to keep working on my original material, and take this journey as far as I can go. I've been working  hard on my new music and i'm now ready to take the next step and record my very first full 10 track album. I know I can make it happen with your support!

My Project

This campaign is raising funds for my debut full studio album. My latest single Take Me Home has been a hit, and is a great example of the new music I will be creating. Click on the link below to download a FREE copy of “Take Me Home”, as a thank you for all your support. 

https://www.reverbnation.com/naomik/song/22886030-take-me-home

Here are a couple of great reviews written about "Take Me Home": 

http://skopemag.com/2015/05/29/naomi-k-take-me-home-single-review 

http://www.muzicnotez.com/magazine/2015/07/naomi-k-take-me-home

As you know, independent artists like me are making music in a very competitive industry. Your investment in my project is not only helping me record, but it's going to help me create the product I need to push Naomi K forward on mainstream radio, and be heard by top record labels executives. Your investment is also helping me create something really special for you - my best songs yet, recorded at the highest caliber possible, made possible directly through your contribution!

My Costs

I was able to cover the costs of recording my 7 singles to date (with various producers) on my own. However I need your help to make my Debut Full 10 track album. Making a professional quality recording is an expensive venture and I can no longer do it alone.  With your support though, this project can become a reality! Your donation to this campaign will go towards covering the following expenses:

1. Pre-production & producer fees

2. Session player recording fees

3. Studio time for recording, mixing, mastering

Each song is going to cost $1,500 USD to record.  A full album of 10 songs is therefore going to cost $15,000 USD, which is my campaign goal. If I am able to raise more than this, the additional funds will go towards the costs of manufacturing the CD's and albums, the merchandise, and more.

For You

As a way to say thank you, I have some really special gifts for you available exclusively through this campaign such as digital album downloads, posters, CD’s, signed CD digipaks, T-shirts, signed vinyl albums, handwritten lyrics, behind-the-scenes photobooks, invitations to the listening party, lifetime backstage passes, or guest vocal/instrumentation on a song. 

Remember, every cent counts! Any amount you can invest is greatly appreciated and will get me one step closer to creating something great. To donate, click on the pink "Contribute Now" button at the top right of this page and Indiegogo will guide you through the rest of the process. Thank you so much for checking out my campaign and I can't wait to make new music for you soon!

Please note: Every single perk offered here is GUARANTEED. Whether I make my target on this campaign or not, the album is still going ahead, it's just that it may take a little longer to finish. 

Other Ways You Can Help

I know not everyone will be in a position to contribute financially, so if this is not possible, I would be grateful if you would share my campaign with your own friends, family, fans and social media pages. Thank you!!

You can hear more of my music on my main page at: 

www.reverbnation.com/naomik 

Check out 2 of my Music Video's too, at the below links: 

Naomi K - Never See You Again - (Official Music Video) https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=XzwGVwd_itI

Naomi K - When I Was Young (Official Music Video) https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=95I1po83xlQ

I recently, and randomly, caught up with some of the amazing crew from the newly launched Yeplive. You can check out my interview with them at: http://app.yeplive.com/watch/7119, and also download their awesome app there, too. 

You can find me on Facebook at: www.facebook.com/naomijkoningen and Twitter at: www.twitter.com/naomikoningen 

I'd love to connect with you!! 

FAQs

  • What sizes are available for the shirts & where do I choose them from?
    Standard sizes of S-XL will be available. Prior to shipment I'll send you an email and you'll be able to choose your size. 
  • When will the album come out?
    I haven't announced a release date just yet but i'll be able communicate that to you at the end of this campaign. 
  • When will my goods ship?
    Just prior to release of the album (see above). Digital copies of the album will be emailed to everyone at least 24 hours prior to official release.
  • I placed an order and have a question.                                                                  If you've placed an order you can file a support ticket. If you have not placed an order please email me at naomi.koningen@gmail.com and I will respond that way. 

Thank you so much everyone, I love you all & appreciate your help in any way, more than words can say. I can't wait to share this album with you!!!!  

Naomi K xxx

story:
Dear Friends, 

A group of caring individuals that we call the "Friends and Family of Rosalie" are completing a tribute/benefit CD for legendary folksinger Rosalie Sorrels. Rosalie is a vivid storyteller, passionate songwriter, singer, teacher and activist, who has been writing, collecting and performing music for nearly six decades. At 82, Rosalie is no longer able to perform.  We need your help in making a lasting tribute to her artistry and humanity while she is still able to appreciate it.  We have gathered more than 40 musicians from around the country and here in Rosalie's beloved Idaho to record her songs, including Loudon Wainwright, III; Peter Rowan; Nanci Griffith; Tom Russell; Guy Clark; Peggy Seeger and Eilen Jewell!

This is a Huge Undertaking and Time is Short.

We already have dozens of songs recorded and many more musicians ready to lend their voices.  We need to complete the final parts of the project that will become a three-CD set featuring voices from country, folk, rock and jazz, each performing a favorite song by Rosalie.  After the recording comes the mixing, pressing, cover design, printing, packaging and more.  

Even with people donating most of their time and resources behind the scenes, we need $25,000 to complete the process. The last step will be a CD release concert in Boise, Idaho, featuring several of the guest musicians who perform on the album.  We hope that Rosalie will be able to be front and center at the CD release concert. 

Every penny raised in the campaign will go into this project and if we are lucky enough to raise more, the rest of the funds will go to help with Rosalie's health care. As a backer of Rosalie's CD Tribute Fund, you will be credited as a supporter.  In addition to the warm feelings of appreciation you'll get, there are also some cool benefits at every level of giving.

A Rich Musical Legacy

They don't make musical artists like Rosalie Sorrels anymore.  She was born in Boise into a family of storytellers, journalists, and farmers.  She began performing in the late 1950s, and in the early 1960s, left her husband and piled her five children in the car to drive across the country performing and raising her voice for social justice.  

Along the way, she collected folk songs and performed them on the Smithsonian Folkways label, recorded 22 albums of her own work, and garnered a Grammy nomination for "The Last Go-Round." She performed in clubs and at folk festivals with other legendary artists such as Pete Seeger and Utah Phillips and hung out with the likes of Hunter S. Thompson and Ken Kesey.  In 2001 at one of her famous birthday parties, Rosalie was honored for her social activism with a handmade quilt presented by the Boise Peace Quilt Project, an honor shared by Rosa Parks, Helen Caldicott, and Cesar Chavez, among other greats.  Each square of her quilt has been photographed so that some of the images can be printed onto postcards with the lyrics of the songs they represent on the back. (The postcard set is one of the perks you can get as a sponsor.)

Experience at Work

As a recording artist and performer myself, as well as a producer, I have been working on this CD with Rosalie's family for the past couple of years.  With Rosalie's health becoming increasingly more fragile, we need your help to finish the project by the end of the year, while she can still participate.  This is a once in a lifetime opportunity to help preserve and document the living legacy of a unique musical and storytelling voice.  

Other Ways You Can Help

This campaign will work best when it's spread word of mouth.   Please tell the story, mention it on your website, Facebook or Twitter, or send a personal email to your friends who you know love the music of this great folksinging legend, Rosalie Sorrels.  

Your help and support is appreciated!  

With Love,  

Rocci & Friends and Family of Rosalie

story:
Alien is a Swedish rock and metal band formed in Gothenburg in 1986 by guitarist Tony Borg and vocalist Jim Jidhed. They are best known today for their single "Only One Woman", a cover of a Marbles song, and "Brave New Love", which was featured in the end credits of the 1988 remake of The Blob.

Alien has finally reunited with the complete and original line up. They toured in 2010 for the first time since 1989 at Monsters of Rock in Eskilstuna, Sweden, and released their first new single in October 2010 - Ready to Fly. The band will tour again on August 16, 2014 in Falun, Sweden and again on October 25 at the HEAT festival in Ludwigsburg, Germany.

 

Members

Jim Jidhed
Tony Borg
Jimmy Wandroph
Toby Tarrach
Ken Sandin

 

Alien "Eternity"

A1. In Love We Trust
A2. Unbroken
A3. Love Will Lead Me Home
A4. I Believe
A5. What Goes Up

B1. Summer Of Love
B2. Wildheart
B3. Liar, Liar
B4. Look At Us Now
B5. In Truth

 

This is the first time Alien - "Eternity" has been released on vinyl. We have kept the original recordings of 10 songs. There will only be 750 copies available on Red color vinyl.

For more information on this release or any future releases please contact Blastzone Entertainment at blastzoneentertainment@yahoo.com

In Love We TrustA2. UnbrokenA3. Love Will Lead Me HomeA4. I BelieveA5. What Goes UpB1. Summer Of LoveB2. WildheartB3. Liar, LiarB4. Look At Us NowB5. In Truth This is the first time Alien - "Eternity" has been released on vinyl. We have kept the original recordings of 10 songs. There will only be 750 copies available on Red color vinyl. For more information on this release or any future releases please contact Blastzone Entertainment at blastzoneentertainment@yahoo.com

story:
Chers amis,

5 ans déjà que Weend'ô a débuté sa véritable lancée avec son 1er album CD/DVD "You Need To Know Yourself" (2012) en co-production avec Olivier Marot (son) et Joël Barberin (images).

5 années fabuleuses ! Vous avez été réceptifs et fidèles à notre dimension musicale. Par vos soutiens, vos témoignages, vous constituez l'élément énergétique nécessaire pour alimenter nos compositions. Nous avions eu d'excellentes chroniques sur le 1er LP :

« Un rock néo progressif à la Spock’s Beard, relatif au choix des grosses guitares mais aussi de l'audace musicale «en prenant le temps». Des riffs métriques impairs, des soli fidèles au heavy mélodique, des guitares ambiant dignes d’un Mike Oldfield, des boucles synthé visant à donner une couleur électro à la Portishead, et une voix mélangeant le timbre d’Amy Lee, le grain de Sinead O’connor, la chaleur des graves de Rachel Jones et la pureté de Lisa Fury dans les aigüs, ex-chanteuses de Karnataka. » cf. Forces Parallèles (octobre 2012)

Nous nous devions de vous sortir un nouvel album de qualité, et pour cela il nous a fallu du temps. Notre musique a toujours été soumise à l'évolution personnelle et à la sensibilité de chacun d'entre nous !

Egalement, Weend'ô oeuvre toujours en tant que label indépendant. Vous comprenez donc les difficultés à tout gérer (production/diffusion/communication/organisation de tournées/promotion...).

Parallèlement, chaque membre du groupe a dû parfaire et accomplir un projet familial tout en préservant son identité musicale et émotionnelle. L'ensemble de ces évolutions nous ont permis d'asseoir encore plus notre maturité ! 

 

  • Le 2ème Album "Time of Awakening" : une prise de conscience, une envie de faire encore mieux.

Cette année 2017, Weend'ô revient avec son 2ème album "Time of Awakening" avec de nouveaux défis que le groupe s'est lancé !

Weend'ô s'affirme dans ce nouvel LP, avec ses convictions intimes. C'est une nouvelle dimension qui s'ouvre à l'état d'éveil. C'est intensément, une prise de conscience sur laquelle chaque auditeur, chaque spectateur, pourra vivre et partager. Vous ne serez pas insensibles aux messages et aux mélodies qui vont littéralement vous "interpeler" dans votre for intérieur !

Et puis, qu'est-ce qu'un album musical, si celui-ci ne peut être perçu et vécu en live?

 

  • La Tournée France / UK - automne 2017

Pour cela, nous avons voulu nous propulser, très rapidement, sur scène, et aller à votre rencontre, vous cher Public, vous qui restez notre adrénaline et représentez, dans le plus profond respect, la base de nos fondamentaux !

Aussi, le groupe partira en tournée en France et au Royaume-Uni à partir du 29 septembre 2017 après une semaine en résidence dans la très belle salle du Rocksane (24 - Bergerac).

Toutes les informations vous seront dévoilées au fur et à mesure de l'avancement de la campagne participative.

Soyez prêts et préparez-vous à nous recevoir chez vous (CD) ou sur scène (Live).

Votre dose d'amour musical, c'est également la nôtre. Nous vous invitons à aller prendre, tous ensemble, le même chemin !

Alors suivez-nous et savourons ensemble ce moment propice à de nouvelles sensations ! 

  •  Ce dont nous avons besoin et ce que vous obtenez

 Pour que ce projet d'album voit le jour, il nous faut des moyens, et vous le savez fort bien !

Ensemble, avec votre participation, nous pourrons produire et promouvoir cet album mieux que le 1er et atteindre des tourneurs/promoteurs étrangers dans notre veine musicale. Fédérer une équipe de professionnels autour du groupe, préalablement ciblés. 

Vous aviez été très nombreux à nous aider pour le DVD "Weend'ô Fairytal'acoustic" (2014) et nous vous en remercions sincèrement !

Nous vous sollicitons à nouveau pour nous permettre d'avoir le bonheur de pouvoir partager nos nouvelles compositions : 

Avec cet album, nous allons nous produire au Royaume-Uni pour la 1ère fois et découvrir un nouveau public, tester notre sensibilité musicale dans le berceau du Rock ! Quel challenge pour nous !!! 

L'objectif est donc de rassembler un maximum de fonds suffisants avant le 21 juin 2017 (N'y avait-il pas mieux que la fête de la musique et la fête de "Terence" pour clôturer cette campagne?)

 

  • A quoi servira la collecte de 7600€ ? 

Nous avons choisi l'option "flexible" tout simplement car , si le montant n'est pas atteint nous pourrons néanmoins récolter les fonds qui aurons déjà été investis. Nous allons donc procéder par priorité et voici dans l'ordre d'importance les niveaux qui seront atteints par vos contributions  : 

  1. Le mixage de l'album
  2. Le mastering de l'album 
  3. Le pressage de 1500 exemplaires CD DIGIPACK 2 volets + livret 8 pages (dont 500 ex destinés à la promotion internationale)
  4. Les frais SDRM (Sacem)
  5. L'achat du nouveau marchandising : Tshirt/Sweat/Goodies
  6. Les photos de presse par un professionnel
  7. La promotion à l'internationale par une agence rock/métal de Paris : Dooweet.
  8. La mise en bac à l'internationale par cette même agence

Les frais déjà supportés par nous mêmes sont le visuel de la pochette de l'album, les montages vidéos, les clips à venir (nous faisons également appel à un groupe d'étudiants en Cinéma de Bordeaux pour l'élaboration d'un clip), la nouvelle tenue de Laetitia créée par la talentueuse styliste designer Stéphanie Saunier, allias "Des Idées Folles" et toute la tournée France/UK.

 

  •  Et si la somme de 7600€ est dépassée ? A quoi servira l'argent ?

Si le montant est dépassé cela permettra de réduire les coûts relatifs aux frais d'organisation de la tournée supportée entièrement par nos propres fonds personnels et ceux collectés par notre association zik passion (paiement des salles, sacem, artistes du plateau invités, nourriture, hébergement, frais de déplacements, rémunération des techniciens). Qui sait ? Si nous avons vraiment beaucoup dépassé la somme initiale, nous pourrons organiser une 2ème tournée...en 2018 !

 

  • De belles contre-parties vous sont proposées !

 

Pour ce 2ème album, nous avons voulu vous privilégier, VOUS, qui allez pré-commander et ainsi permettre la naissance de ce beau projet qui nous tient tant à coeur !

Alors n'attendez pas un instant et allez voir immédiatement ce que nous vous offrons !

Anticipez et n'hésitez pas à offrir des packs, à vos amis et proches, que ce soit pour un événement familial, amical, convivial ou pour Noël 2017 qui arrivera très vite une fois l'album sorti. "Time of Awakening" sera un beau cadeau, propice à ressentir un très beau moment d'éveil ! :)

Toutes les participations sont les bienvenues quelles qu'elles soient, petits ou gros budgets, cette aventure de coeur va encore nous promettre de belles surprises !!!

 

  •  D'autres façons d'aider

 Pour les personnes qui ne peuvent pas contribuer financièrement à cette campagne, cela ne veut pas dire qu'elles ne peuvent pas aider , au contraire ! Vous êtes nos meilleurs moyens de communication !! Vous saurez défendre notre musique !! N'attendez pas un instant et foncez !

  • Utilisez vos réseaux internet, amis, proches...et diffusez le projet :)

 

MERCI ENORMEMENT POUR VOTRE BELLE ENERGIE PARTAGEE DANS CE NOUVEAU PROJET !​

 

BIOGRAPHIE DE WEENDO : 

 

membres : 

Laetitia Chaudemanche (chant/clavier/textes)

Terence Nguyen Van (guitare/arrangements)

Maxime Rami (Basse)

Nathanaël Buis (batterie/samples/visuels)

 

« Sans la musique, la vie serait une erreur » (Nietzsche)

Cette philosophie définit parfaitement la vision des deux fondateurs du groupe, Térence et Lætitia. Leur rencontre est fusionnelle et le chant appelle la guitare. De leur musique naît un couple; de ce couple naît un fils « Ewen » ; de ce fils provient l'origine du nom du projet « Weend'ô ». Cette fenêtre vers le monde, vers l’inconnu, vers la dualité, vers l’union.

C'est avec méthode, humilité, simplicité, patience, persévérance, indépendance et sacrifices que ce couple passionné crée son propre univers musical.

En 2008, Weend'ô finalise son identité avec l’arrivée de trois nouveaux membres, Rod à la guitare, Maxime à la basse et Donovan à la batterie. Le groupe gagne en maturité et voit l'arrivée d’un nouveau batteur en la personne de Nathanaël en juillet 2010. Il s’attaque en octobre 2010 à l’enregistrement de son premier album («You Need To Know Yourself») avec Olivier Marot, producteur indépendant de Balance Association, au studio ART TOP près d'Angoulême, suite à leur 1er prix aquitain du concours Top Rock des Indépendants.

Weend'ô y explore l'être humain en profondeur. Les textes écrits par Lætitia sont tirés d'expérience vécues et les musiques laissent transparaître un rock mélodique progressif teinté de puissants riffs parfois asymétriques, Weend'ô accompagnant l’auditeur – spectateur dans un voyage sonore inoubliable.

Leur 1er album CD/DVD sorti en janvier 2012 marque d’emblée la scène rock. Les webzines parlent « d’un joyau incandescent » (Metalkiller) ou bien « un grand coup de cœur, Weend’ô est vraiment un groupe à découvrir… album de qualité, original qui plus est. » (Neoprog) ou bien encore « Le groupe assène un grand coup à la scène progressive. » (Spirit of Rock). Le groupe est nommé « meilleur groupe et meilleur album en novembre 2012 » dans un webzine rock métal au Brésil. L’album fait même parti du Top 5 de Musicwaves !

Ce début 2013 marquera également un changement de line up. Après le départ du 2nd guitariste, Weend’ô évolue désormais sur scène à 4. Le groupe propose une nouvelle version de leur 1er album avec de nouveaux arrangements apportés par un claviériste de renommée internationale, Stéphane Deriau-Reine (Los Angeles). + de 100 radios diffuseront ces nouvelles versions grâce à l’intervention d’un attaché de presse qui a vu le potentiel du groupe. En Mai 2013 , Weend'ô est  cité comme « La Grande Révélation » au Festival International Prog Sud près de Marseilles.

En seulement 2 ans, Weend'ô fidélise un public et grâce au financement de ses fans par le biais du site « kisskissbankbank » le groupe réussit une collecte de 4251€ pour son projet acoustique du 1er album .

Véritable hommage à l'Amour de l'Art, le DVD « Weend'ô Fairytal’acoustic » est une fusion artistique entre la musique, la danse, la haute couture, la sculpture, la peinture et le cinéma. Weend’ô nous délivre avec cette œuvre la quintessence de son talent. On connaissait la Force de Weend’ô dans leur version électrique, on reste littéralement subjugué par la pureté et la beauté spirituelle de ce groupe avec cette version acoustique !

Le groupe s’accorde un temps de pause à partir de juin 2014 jusqu’à mars 2015 pour des projets d’ordre personnels.

Weend’ô revient en force en 2015, le 22 avril, en étant le guest du grand groupe anglais emblématique dans le rock progressif : ARENA, affiche unique en France (Toulouse). Retour marqué par leur performance au Festival Garonna Show en Juillet 2015, en tête d’affiche de la scène d’entrée !

Depuis l’été 2016, Weend’ô travaille sur le 2ème album….Le groupe souhaite être prêt à œuvrer pour le plus grand bonheur de tous à l’automne 2017 avec une tournée France/Angleterre !    

Un groupe français à suivre de près, et à découvrir en Live !! La puissance et la sensibilité à l’état pur animent ce groupe !!

DISCOGRAPHIE

  • 2012 :« You Need To Know Yoursefl » (CD/DVD)
  • 2014 : “Weend’ô Fairytal’acoustic (DVD live)
  • 2017 : “Time of Awakening) (CD) to be released in Autumn 2017

       www.weendo.fr

story:
PROJECT INTRODUCTIONS:

Hello my name is Honey from the band, Honey and The Emperor. I am singer-songwriter/ musician, performing artist, and dancer. I am working on my second Album, Moon Dream and I need your help. I graduated from The New School University with a double B.A in Literature and Dance. I also am a Reiki Master Healer and Yoga Teacher, serving to uplift and heal our community. I am a teacher of the arts, teaching Music, Theater and Dance to children at The Rabbit Hole Theater in SF. I am establishing my own unique business as a Musician, Healer, and Performing artist. I have new and exciting work to share with you, but I just can’t do it alone.  Help me finish my second Album, Moon Dream.

My passion is music. My goal with music is to uplift, heal and share creative musical experiences in our community and world. In 2014, the band Honey and the Emperor was established and we have played shows all over the bay area, at cafes, in galleries, record stores, venues, and on the streets of Oakland. In 2015, I came out with my debut Album, LA MER with producer Geoff Saba at Itinerant Home Recordings. With your help and support I was able to pay for production of the last Album LA MER. I am overjoyed to announce that we are working on birthing this next piece of work.

Geoff and I are collaborating again, working my second Album, Moon Dream: Chapter 1, which has felt like a long, eye-opening, process. Currently, I am at a standstill. I need help in the completion of this project. I need help in the cost for mixing and mastering these songs. I long to share more songs with you. I need your support. I am humbled and excited by this creative process of making music, however I can’t do it alone. By helping me release these songs you can help me continue to grow my career and goals as a singer, musician and performer. My prayer with this work is that it is able to shed light and love into this world, inspire you too to create and move toward your dreams. Art making is a collective effort, all of our creative visions matter, adding unique shapes and colors to this creative experience of life.

WHAT WE NEED & WHAT YOU GET

My main goal with this project is to complete the 5 songs that we are  almost done recording. I have two more songs to add backing vocals to, which will cost 80 dollars more. Then they will be ready for the mixing and mastering process. Each song costs 70 dollars to be mixed and 80 dollars per song to be mastered. This is a total of 750 dollars, that is just to complete the first part of the project. Due to financial set backs, I’ve had to break the album up into two projects. Moon Dream: Chapter 1 and Moon Dream: Chapter 2. I am supper excited to share that I have more new songs that didn’t make it onto this album and I would love to also share these with you. For these I'd need an estimate amount of 6 hours per song ($16 per hour) for 5 songs, which would come to 480 dollars, plus the mixing and mastering fee, which would make the Part 2 of the Album $1230 dollars. Add this to Moon Dream: Part one, put it all together and you get roughly $2,000.

A very important cause for this fundraiser is to raise more money to pay the band. As musicians we work really hard, any extra money will contribute to these causes: helping fund Part 2 of the Album, paying my amazing bandmates, making music videos, and renting rehearsal/ performance spaces/theaters for shows. My collaborators Bryan Lovett, Brian Fogg, Joel Davidson, and Geoff Saba helped make this Album happen, spending long hours in the recording studio and rehearsals.  Also, a big dream of mine is build a show with these songs, with a storyline and characters and put it up on the stage. I'd love to make a theatrical music show with these songs and take these songs on Tour. Help me raise another $600 to help fund these numerous causes, and get these dreams in motion. 

For your support, I’d love to offer you this music with a bunch of really great perks. What you get is directly from the heart. For contributing, there are many great perks for you. You can chose from any of these options; get a downloadable copy of the Album, (Moon Dream), custom made Tapes with Album Art and Lyrics on the inside, free tickets to the release party, chakra bracelets (made by yours truly), Reiki and (Distant Reiki for those far away) and more. This all comes from my heart with great gratitude. We are all devoted, hard working musicians, eager to share this work with you. Music is my deepest joy and honor and what keeps me alive. Help Honey and The Emperor grow. Help me get this dazzling music out there.

THE IMPACT

We need more music and art on this planet, especially right now. We musicians and artists look to you for love and support. I am devoted to making music, theater and dance to help better our culture and uniting our hearts. Contributing to this project will be of great impact to you and the community. These songs I have written from my heart and I believe have the power to connect and heal. These songs are reflections of my direct experience and hopefully can offer you inspiration, and new ways of seeing the world. Through the mediums of music, we can interact with poetry, storytelling and collage, it's a  beautiful way to enrich our experience and create peaceful connection with one another. Life is built of moments, music helps distill and open the moment (time and space). Music can change reality to calm and even center, the mind/ body/spirit into new perspectives.The power of music has changed my life beyond measure, it has healed heart break, career changes, steered my mind from depression to joy, shifting my relationships into love and acceptance. It's helped me see and feel connection in this world. This makes the impact of this Album and performing these songs very important to me and important for me to share with you. Music is my daily act of prayer and devotion. Through this project I’d love to raise awareness of the importance of women and the music scene, where its not always easy. I'm not saying that to get sympathy, I'm saying it because it's what I have experienced first hand, period. There is something unique, raw, and personal here in this new album, Moon Dream. I hope I can share all 10 songs with you. They are birthed from direct experience; in dreams and waking life.  Most importantly by contributing, this will help complete over a year long project and will help future projects move forward, so that I can put out the next wave of songs, that are also ready to start recording. With your help, we can make it happen, we can build a team, a strong community of Honey and The Emperor supporters. With more support, I’ll be able to finish the album , finish the sequel Moon Dream: Part two. Hopefully, one day I'll get these songs on the stage,  we'll be able travel more, taking these songs on tour. That's the over arching dream! This is an eye opening process and it is very humbling to say the least, help make this second Album, Moon Dream, reach fruition. The music in Moon Dream is waiting to soar into your hearts. 

OVERCOMING OBSTACLES

This process of recording and the music scene has not always been easy. Finding time, money and trust worthy resources, has been really challenging for me this year. Trusting the process has been an eye opening opportunity to get clear about my goals. I have dedicated my life to music and dance, working hard as a professional dancer and musician for over a decade. This year has been particularly hard, and sometimes I have wanted to give up, bc shows fall through, bands fall apart, the nitty gritty gets gritty. Yet, somehow I still wake up and write songs and love expressing myself in this way. It feels like what I was put on this earth to do. I put long hours, hard work and effort into this work and love it more than anything. The abundance I feel about this work, is not always reflected in my bank account. I work with and for people who are all very talented musicians/artists, who also struggle with similar circumstances. Help us grow so I can pay the band, finish album, and travel with this music more. We would love your support in helping us finish this project.

OTHER WAYS YOU CAN HELP

I understand a lot of us our going through life in many different ways. If you can't contribute at this time, that is totally ok, I LOVE YOU. There are other ways you could help. Share this fundraiser on Facebook, Instagram (everywhere) with your friends, family and community, through email and social media. Please help me get the word out there to share with people that could support this project. Thank you so much for reading this and being wonderful humans. You helped us do our work with the last project, which I am deeply grateful for. Please help us take this music to the next level, share and spread this  music into our community, uplifting the collective human heart. Asking for help is the most vulnerable and humbling aspect of living as a musician and artist. I am deeply grateful and indebted to you for your kindness, love and support. My heart soars with love from your generosity and am so very, very grateful. I really couldn't do it with out you. Thank you. Om peace, peace, peace.
story_txt:
PROJECT INTRODUCTIONS:
Hello my name is Honey from the band, Honey and The Emperor. I am singer-songwriter/ musician, performing artist, and dancer. I am working on my second Album, Moon Dream and I need your help. I graduated from The New School University with a double B.A in Literature and Dance. I also am a Reiki Master Healer and Yoga Teacher, serving to uplift and heal our community. I am a teacher of the arts, teaching Music, Theater and Dance to children at The Rabbit Hole Theater in SF. I am establishing my own unique business as a Musician, Healer, and Performing artist. I have new and exciting work to share with you, but I just can’t do it alone.  Help me finish my second Album, Moon Dream.
My passion is music. My goal with music is to uplift, heal and share creative musical experiences in our community and world. In 2014, the band Honey and the Emperor was established and we have played shows all over the bay area, at cafes, in galleries, record stores, venues, and on the streets of Oakland. In 2015, I came out with my debut Album, LA MER with producer Geoff Saba at Itinerant Home Recordings. With your help and support I was able to pay for production of the last Album LA MER. I am overjoyed to announce that we are working on birthing this next piece of work.
Geoff and I are collaborating again, working my second Album, Moon Dream: Chapter 1, which has felt like a long, eye-opening, process. Currently, I am at a standstill. I need help in the completion of this project. I need help in the cost for mixing and mastering these songs. I long to share more songs with you. I need your support. I am humbled and excited by this creative process of making music, however I can’t do it alone. story:
Thank you for your interest in LIT SOUL and our brand new album! We would love for you to help support LIT SOUL in funding this release. Now this is no regular fundraiser as we are not asking for a freebie. The perks are FOR YOU in this and they are really great. We have put together a list of perks that we think you will enjoy, and have a variety of price ranges available.

*Photos of all the Perks are available right under the video at the top! 

The purpose of this campaign is to raise enough money to complete the 6th album by LIT SOUL. We have three music albums and two poetry albums and one is with music. This will be the 4th music album and 6th overall piece of art from LIT SOUL. The music industry has changed quite a bit since the days of big labels and record deals, and most independent bands do all of the legwork themselves in the hopes that their art is created and heard.

This campaign and this album are extremely important to LIT SOUL because this is the first album with our new line-up, and we feel this is the strongest line-up to date. We are really excited about this release because it showcases a new direction for the band that fans of HIM, The Cult, Danzig, Neil Young, Type O Negative will love.

We really like giving back to our fans and feel that by having an IndieGoGo Campaign we can give fans the opportunity to be part of the process from the beginning and get the new album, past releases, new merchandise, and additional perks before anyone else has a chance to. This is a great opportunity to get LIT SOUL merchandise at affordable prices, support independent rock n’ roll, and feel good about helping independent artists follow their dreams.

Contributors will help us achieve our goal of creating the 6th album by LIT SOUL, which is an extended EP including a video. There are a lot of costs that go into recording a CD, including the recording process itself, mixing, and mastering. In addition, there are a lot of costs that go into rehearsing to prepare for the CD, and then there is the cost of producing the actual CD itself. We have already started the recording process for one of the songs and hope to raise at least $2200.00 to help complete the rest of the album.  

All money raised will go towards the production of our upcoming album, even if we don’t reach our goal. If we exceed our goal, the additional money will be spent on video production for our first single, "You Blessed My Eyes With Your Cruelty."

Our biggest obstacle is coming up with the funding to create professional music. With all of the costs involved and limited budget we needed to turn to you for support. Independent artists are now doing a lot on their own, and depending on their fan bases for support. It’s difficult for musicians these days since music is so easily accessible for free.

We really appreciate your support for LIT SOUL and for our campaign. Please spread the word about our campaign, share this post on your social media, and tell your friends. Every bit helps! Just use the IndieGoGo Share Tools right here!

story:
Short Summary

I have been playing guitar since 2010 and have been dreaming of recording an album since 2012, but it has been delayed many times for a multitude of reasons.  I have since added improved content and matured in my playing and composing.  Expressing myself through my art means the world to me and I want it to impact others too, but I need your support to get there.

What We Need & What You Get

Your funds will go towards the cost of studio recording time, the cost of mixing/mastering, album art/other graphic design, printing, and physical/electronic distribution.

These funds won't come solely from donation, but your advance purchase of goods and/or services including electronic downloads, physical CD copies, guitar lessons, a fanned fret guitar, or even a house concert!

Even if we don't meet our total goal, all funds raised will minimize my out of pocket cost to record this album.  Essentially I'm trying to not be a starving artist from the very start.

Other Ways You Can Help

Whether or not you have the available funds to contribute financially to this campaign, sharing across your social media platform helps tremendously!  Please feel free to share and to do so regularly.  Everyone I'm close to would back this with or without the campaign, so help me get the word out to everyone else that you know and I don't that may be interested.  

I truly appreciate any and all support from everyone!

 

Much love,

Darrius

story:
Osim što je najdulji i najsunčaniji, Hvar je jedan od najljepših hrvatskih otoka. Ove godine u najistočnijem mjestu na otoku, Sućurju, održat će se šesto izdanje festivala. Tijekom zime, u mjestu ne živi više od 250 stanovnika, a tijekom ljeta se taj broj višestruko povećava i doseže do 1500 stanovnika i turističkih gostiju.

Usprkos tome, sva akcija na otoku događa se na zapadnom kraju otoka. Za Sućuraj možemo reći da u njemu vlada mirna mediteranska atmosfera, a središte okupljanja svih generacija je lokalna konoba i nekolicina ugostiteljskih objekata. Otok Hvar je u prošlosti bio izoliran kao i mnogi drugi otoci na hrvatskoj obali radi rata, ekonomske krize ili jednostavno geografskog položaja. Specifičnost mjesta Sućuraj je veća blizina obali od zapadne strane otoka što ga čini lako dostupnim javnim prijevozom.

 Nekoliko prijatelja rođenih u Sućurju, tijekom čestih putovanja u Split i druge gradove, upoznali su alternativnu glazbenu scenu i poželjeli je dovesti u rodno mjesto. Glazbeni festival je bio logičan potez s obzirom na važnost glazbe za njih osobno i kao sredstvo povezivanja ljudi i kultura. I tako je malo mjesto na otoku dobilo festival koji okuplja sudionike iz Hrvatske, Balkana i Europe.

Tam-Tam Music Festival je već postao poznato događanje među zaljubljenicima u glazbu iz Hrvatske, BiH, Srbije i Slovenije. Radi nepostojanja jezične barijere, posjetitelji imaju priliku čuti različite glazbene žanrove; od surf i post rocka do noisea i upoznati alternativnu glazbu ovih prostora kao protutežu popularnim "lakonotnim" izvođačima.

 

U prtoteklih 5 godina, na festivalu je sviralo više od 20 afirmiranih bendova iz Francuske, Srbije, BiH, Slovenije i naravno Hrvatske. Publiku su sačinjavali većinom lokalni posjetitelji iz Sućurja i cijelog makarskog primorja.Međutim, radi se o intimnom malom festivalu te je stajalište organizatora zadržati najviše 400-500 posjetitelja. Vaša podrška nam je vrlo važna kako bismo pokrili putne troškove izvođačima i unaprijedili festivalsku infrastrukturu.

                   

Ove godine planiramo  izgraditi udobni kamp za posjetitelje sa svim potrebnim sadržajima u kojemu će se održavati radionice yoge i uživati uz glazbu DJ-a.

Festival ima osiguran manji dio sredstva za razglas od općine Sućuraj, ali ta nam sredstva nisu dovoljna za pokrivanje svih troškova. U galeriji fotografija možete vidjeti video sastavljanja pozornice u kojem sudjeluju čak i neki od izvođača. Kako bi se festival nastavio razvijati, potrebna je bolja promidžba i uspostavljanje mreže volontera za koje treba osigurati smještaj i hranu. Potrebna su nam sredstva od 60 000kn  kako bismo festival doveli na kvalitetniju razinu.

Sredstva prikupljena ovom kampanjom namjeramo utrošiti na sav potrebni materijal za izgradnju kampa i potrebne infrastrukture  kako bi se naši gosti osjećali što ugodnije, te kupnju materijala potrebnog za  konstrukcije kojom bi natkrili binu u slučaju kiše, a koju bi sami sastavili. Upravo je  kiša  i loše vrijeme jedini rizik kojem se festival iz godine u godinu izlaže. Također ako bi ovom kampanjom uspjeli prikupiti cijeli iznos, jedan dio sredstava utrošili bi na torškove  volontera koje ove godine po prvi puta angažiramo upravo zbog pomoći oko izgradnje kampa.

Za naše podržavatelje pripremili smo raznovrsne poklone i promo materijale, a koji su nazvani po modelima popularnih TAM kamiona bez kojih cijela ova priča ne bi bila moguća. Nadamo se da ćete nam pomoći da naš festival postane još bolji.

Ukoliko niste u mogućnosti financijski podržat kampanju dovoljno će biti da na svom facebook profilu podijelite event festivala i pozovete ekipu na tjedan dana zabave u Sućurju na Hvaru.

 

 

*We made this campaign to raise funds for the Tam-Tam Music Festival in Croatia, which is held every summer on the island of Hvar. Apart from being the longest and definitely the sunniest on our coast, Hvar is also one of the most beautiful Croatian islands. In 2017, the Tam-Tam Festival will hopefully be held for the 6th time in a small place on the island called Sućuraj, with not more than 250 inhabitants during the winter.

Although the number of tourists in the summer increases the population on Hvar by 7 times or more, the main tourist action is still on the western side on the island. Sućuraj, located on the far east of the island, is known for its quiet, easygoing Mediterranean atmosphere and people of all ages socializing with tourists in the local taverns. The island was isolated in some periods of its history, as many other islands on the Croatian coast, due to war, economic scarcity or simply its geographic position. Sućuraj, on the other hand, is closer to the coast than the western part of the island and therefore easily accessible by car or public transport. 

A few friends born in Sućuraj, but frequently traveling to Split and other cities, became very passionate about bringing an alternative music festival to Sućuraj. A music festival was the logical thing since music is an important part of their lives and a medium for connecting people and cultures. It is only poetic justice that a rather isolated place on an island holds a festival that brings together people and bands from Croatia, the Balkans and Europe, don't you think?

Tam-Tam Music Festival has already become a known event among music lovers from Croatia, Bosnia and Herzegovina, Serbia and Slovenia. Due to the lack of a language barrier, the visitors have a chance to hear various styles of music; from surf and post-punk to noise rock from the Balkan region -  indie and alternative music different from "easy notes music" that many people listen  in these countries.

In the last five years, the festival brought more than twenty notable bands from France, Serbia, Bosnia and Herzegovina, Slovenia and Croatia. The audience consisted of the locals from Sućuraj, rockers from Makarska, Ploče and other nearby cities and tourists, of which some came exclusively for the festival. Still, it is a small festival with not more than 400 tickets sold every year and we would like to keep it small and intimate. Your support is very important for us because it will enable us to pay the travel costs of the artists and to improve the overall infrastructure of the festival site. 

This year we plan to build a cosy camp with all infrastructure called camp "TAMp" where visitors can practice yoga every day and enjoy live music from DJ's acts.  We would like to improve the conditions for our guest bands and the festival visitors. We have support from local  municipality​  in form of a small donation up to 1 500 USD. You could reasonably say that we already have the basics, but your help would really make a visible difference for everybody attending the festival. In our photo gallery and the attached video you can see the setting up of the stage with band members as volunteers. We understand completely why that is charming for our guests, but the main reason for that way of functioning were financial constraints. We would like to have a budget of at least 8 000  USD at our disposal so we can build a proper stage with protection from wind and rain. Hvar is the sunniest island, but you never know...

The funds raised through this campaign we will spent to buy the necessary material for building the camp with necessary infrastructure to make our guests feel as comfortable as possible, and to buy the materials needed for the construction which we will use to cover the stage in case of bad weather and rain. Each year we face the same risks, mostly ones we have no influence on, such as bad weather and ferries breaking down. Also, if this campaign reach goal a part of the funds would be spent for  the volunteer  that we engaged for the first time this year for helping us with building the camp.

We prepared a rich set of perks for our supporters. Perks are named by models of popular TAM trucks. We hope you will help us make our festival even better.

If you are not able to financially support the campaign it will be enough to share Facebook event on your  Facebook profile and invite your friends to a week of fun in Sućuraj on the island of Hvar.
story_txt: Osim što je najdulji i najsunčaniji, Hvar je jedan od najljepših hrvatskih otoka. Ove godine u najistočnijem mjestu na otoku, Sućurju, održat će se šesto izdanje festivala. Tijekom zime, u mjestu ne živi više od 250 stanovnika, a tijekom ljeta se taj broj višestruko povećava i doseže do 1500 stanovnika i turističkih gostiju.Usprkos tome, sva akcija na otoku događa se na zapadnom kraju otoka. Za Sućuraj možemo reći da u njemu vlada mirna mediteranska atmosfera, a središte okupljanja svih generacija je lokalna konoba i nekolicina ugostiteljskih objekata. Otok Hvar je u prošlosti bio izoliran kao i mnogi drugi otoci na hrvatskoj obali radi rata, ekonomske krize ili jednostavno geografskog položaja. Specifičnost mjesta Sućuraj je veća blizina obali od zapadne strane otoka što ga čini lako dostupnim javnim prijevozom. Nekoliko prijatelja rođenih u Sućurju, tijekom čestih putovanja u Split i druge gradove, upoznali su alternativnu glazbenu scenu i poželjeli je dovesti u rodno mjesto. Glazbeni festival je bio logičan potez s obzirom na važnost glazbe za njih osobno i kao sredstvo povezivanja ljudi i kultura. I tako je malo mjesto na otoku dobilo festival koji okuplja sudionike iz Hrvatske, Balkana i Europe.Tam-Tam Music Festival je već postao poznato događanje među zaljubljenicima u glazbu iz Hrvatske, BiH, Srbije i Slovenije. Radi nepostojanja jezične barijere, posjetitelji imaju priliku čuti različite glazbene žanrove; od surf i post rocka do noisea i upoznati alternativnu glazbu ovih prostora kao protutežu popularnim "lakonotnim" izvođačima. U prtoteklih 5 godina, na festivalu je sviralo više od 20 afirmiranih bendova iz Francuske, Srbije, BiH, Slovenije i naravno Hrvatske. Publiku su sačinjavali većinom lokalni posjetitelji iz Sućurja i cijelog makarskog primorja.Međutim, radi se o intimnom malom festivalu te je stajalište organizatora zadržati najviše 400-500 posjetitelja. Vaša podrška nam je vrlo važna kako bismo pokrili putne troškove izvođačima i unaprijedili festivalsku infrastrukturu.                   Ove godine planiramo  izgraditi udobni kamp za posjetitelje sa svim potrebnim sadržajima u kojemu će se održavati radionice yoge i uživati uz glazbu DJ-a.Festival ima osiguran manji dio sredstva za razglas od općine Sućuraj, ali ta nam sredstva nisu dovoljna za pokrivanje svih troškova. U galeriji fotografija možete vidjeti video sastavljanja pozornice u kojem sudjeluju čak i neki od izvođača. Kako bi se festival nastavio razvijati, potrebna je bolja promidžba i uspostavljanje mreže volontera za koje treba osigurati smještaj i hranu. Potrebna su nam sredstva od 60 000kn  kako bismo festival doveli na kvalitetniju razinu.Sredstva prikupljena ovom kampanjom namjeramo utrošiti na sav potrebni materijal za izgradnju kampa i potrebne infrastrukture  kako bi se naši gosti osjećali što ugodnije, te kupnju materijala potrebnog za  konstrukcije kojom bi natkrili binu u slučaju kiše, a koju bi sami sastavili. Upravo je  kiša  i loše vrijeme jedini rizik kojem se festival iz godine u godinu izlaže. Također ako bi ovom kampanjom uspjeli prikupiti cijeli iznos, jedan dio sredstava utrošili bi na torškove  volontera koje ove godine po prvi puta angažiramo upravo zbog pomoći oko izgradnje kampa.Za naše podržavatelje pripremili smo raznovrsne poklone i promo materijale, a koji su nazvani po modelima popularnih TAM kamiona bez kojih cijela ova priča ne bi bila moguća. Nadamo se da ćete nam pomoći da naš festival postane još bolji.Ukoliko niste u mogućnosti financijski podržat kampanju dovoljno će biti da na svom facebook profilu podijelite event festivala i pozovete ekipu na tjedan dana zabave u Sućurju na Hvaru.  *We made this campaign to raise funds for the Tam-Tam Music Festival in Croatia, which is held every summer on the island of Hvar. Apart from being the longest and definitely the sunniest on our coast, Hvar is also one of the most beautiful Croatian islands. In 2017, the Tam-Tam Festival will hopefully be held for the 6th time in a small place on the island called Sućuraj, with not more than 250 inhabitants during the winter.Although the number of tourists in the summer increases the population on Hvar by 7 times or more, the main tourist action is still on the western side on the island. Sućuraj, located on the far east of the island, is known for its quiet, easygoing Mediterranean atmosphere and people of all ages socializing with tourists in the local taverns. The island was isolated in some periods of its history, as many other islands on the Croatian coast, due to war, economic scarcity or simply its geographic position. Sućuraj, on the other hand, is closer to the coast than the western part of the island and therefore easily accessible by car or public transport. A few friends born in Sućuraj, but frequently traveling to Split and other cities, became very passionate about bringing an alternative music festival to Sućuraj. A music festival was the logical thing since music is an important part of their lives and a medium for connecting people and cultures. It is only poetic justice that a rather isolated place on an island holds a festival that brings together people and bands from Croatia, the Balkans and Europe, don't you think?Tam-Tam Music Festival has already become a known event among music lovers from Croatia, Bosnia and Herzegovina, Serbia and Slovenia. Due to the lack of a language barrier, the visitors have a chance to hear various styles of music; from surf and post-punk to noise rock from the Balkan region -  indie and alternative music different from "easy notes music" that many people listen  in these countries.In the last five years, the festival brought more than twenty notable bands from France, Serbia, Bosnia and Herzegovina, Slovenia and Croatia. The audience consisted of the locals from Sućuraj, rockers from Makarska, Ploče and other nearby cities and tourists, of which some came exclusively for the festival. Still, it is a small festival with not more than 400 tickets sold every year and we would like to keep it small and intimate. Your support is very important for us because it will enable us to pay the travel costs of the artists and to improve the overall infrastructure of the festival site. This year we plan to build a cosy camp with all infrastructure called camp "TAMp" where visitors can practice yoga every day and enjoy live music from DJ's acts.  We would like to improve the conditions for our guest bands and the festival visitors. We have support from local  municipality​  in form of a small donation up to 1 500 USD. You could reasonably say that we already have the basics, but your help would really make a visible difference for everybody attending the festival. In our photo gallery and the attached video you can see the setting up of the stage with band members as volunteers. We understand completely why that is charming for our guests, but the main reason for that way of functioning were financial constraints. We would like to have a budget of at least 8 000  USD at our disposal so we can build a proper stage with protection from wind and rain. Hvar is the sunniest island, but you never know...The funds raised through this campaign we will spent to buy the necessary material for building the camp with necessary infrastructure to make our guests feel as comfortable as possible, and to buy the materials needed for the construction which we will use to cover the stage in case of bad weather and rain. Each year we face the same risks, mostly ones we have no influence on, such as bad weather and ferries breaking down. Also, if this campaign reach goal a part of the funds would be spent for  the volunteer  that we engaged for the first time this year for helping us with building the camp.We prepared a rich set of perks for our supporters. Perks are named by models of popular TAM trucks. We hope you will help us make our festival even better.If you are not able to financially support the campaign it will be enough to share Facebook event on your  Facebook profile and invite your friends to a week of fun in Sućuraj on the island of Hvar.

story:
Short Summary

Award winning guitarist Laura Husbands is recording her debut CD.  She is ready to record and needs your help getting in the studio and with the cost of printing and producing the CD'S.  Here's some facts about Laura:

  • 11 Top International Competition Prizes
  • Over 200,000 Views on YouTube
  • Renowned Teacher at the University of Denver
  • 4 Degrees with Honors from the Royal Scottish Academy of Music and the University of Denver

What I Need & What You Get

I am looking to get the bare minimum of $1500 to pay for:

  • Studio Time: This is a little on the low side but I have been practicing hard and plan to not have to do too many takes :)
  • CD Artwork:  Nothing fancy but I am planning on making the best sounding and best looking CD that I can make!
  • CD Printing:  While I am not going crazy on this price it will cost me some money to bring this to the print and getting the physical copies
  • CD Distribution: Just allocating a little bit to get the CD's out to all of you!

Other Ways You Can Help

Contributing financially is definitely not the only way to help!  Get the word out about me!  Everyone who listens to my music helps me get my name out but also helps me accomplish my first dream, having people listen to me playing guitar.  Also check out laurahusbands.com to keep up to date with what I am doing.  Thanks for reading!

story:
You Down With A.L.P.?

My name is Amanda Lee Peers, and I’m a singer/songwriter from Rochester, NY. If you’re a fan of NBC’s The Voice, you may recognize me as a contestant on Gwen Stefani’s team from Season 7. It was a life-changing experience, and I am so grateful to have been given the opportunity to share my story and talent with the world. Since then, I've recorded and released my own EP called Summertime State of Mind and have performed all over NY, PA, MA and CT to promote it!

But It’s been over two years since I released that EP, and I owe you all some new music big time! I’ve been writing a ton of new songs, and I’m really excited to share them with you!

The EP

I've been back in the studio and have teamed up with producer Sam Polizzi to create something really fresh and new. We have sifted through tons of songs and decided on 6 that really spoke to us. I can confidently say this EP is completely different than anything I've released so far. 

For this CD, I wanted to show another side of me - the side that hurts, that makes mistakes, the side that's not all sunshine and butterflies. It's darker, more personal and full of emotion. All these songs have been inspired by my life stories, but are relatable no matter who you are or where you've been.

I believe this album is a start to something really great, and I really want you to be a part of it!

Why Pledge?

I have been so blessed to have such awesome support in my life - family, friends and fans included! You all inspire me to work harder and persevere, but sometimes it's not easy. I'm not good at asking for help, but I've realized that I can't do this alone, nor do I want to. I need your help now more than ever, and I'm not ashamed to let you know!

Why Now?

I recorded my last EP in the comforts of a practice space and living room, with little more than a $100 microphone. While it was cool to say it was a DIY release, I felt it was time to take things to the next level and record a fully-produced, studio EP.

Quality doesn't come cheap, but I've done my best and have been able to cover all recording costs, including hiring some kick-ass musicians! So the good news is the songs are already written and recorded. The bad news is production has come to a stopping point until I can cover the costs to mix and master the songs. But it doesn't stop there!

The Costs

I not only want to make music my career, I want to change people's lives. In order to do that, I not only need to finish the EP, but I need to make music videos, pay for a radio promo campaign and get my music coast to coast! Here's a breakdown of where your contribution will go:

The Rewards

The last thing I want is for you to leave here feeling empty handed. So in exchange for your contribution and support, I've come up with some fun rewards to make it worth your while. How about an exclusive acoustic CD thats never been sold before, or a vinyl record with unreleased songs, exclusive to backers only. Tea anyone? Check them out over to the right!

Secret Perks
I will also be offering secret perks to my mailing list only! If you want access to these exclusive perks, head over to www.amandaleepeers.com, and sign up on my mailing list.

Want something that's not listed as a reward?
Email me at contact(at)amandaleepeers.com, and I'll do my best to make that reward available!

Others Way To Help

You really want to help but just don't have the funds to contribute...that's okay! You can help by sharing this page on your social media sites and telling all your friends and family about it! The more you help me spread the word, the faster I can finish the EP and get you new music!

story:
The clock is ticking! We're getting closer to the launch of the first-ever We Make Waves Conference + Festival in November and we need an extra boost from our fans to deliver the best programme ever!

Please be part of this journey and support a vital community of female, trans and non-binary artists and activists in music, in whatever way you can.

We Make Waves's first ever edition will showcase some of the most dynamic female, trans and non-binary voices in music today. 

The one and only JD Samson (Le Tigre/JD Samson & MEN) will deliver the Keynote address on Thursday, November 9th at St. Elisabeth Kirche. This event, in collaboration with Native Instruments will kick off a night of awesome live performances by Julianna Barwick, Lyra, Stella Chiweshe, Marisa Anderson, Isabel Lewis, Derya Yildirim, Olimpia Splendid, DJ Larry (Creamcake), and rRoxymore! 

The rest of our live performance lineup includes: AH MER AH SU (Oakland, US) // A.W.A. (African Women Arise - Zimbabwe) // The Chicks (Chicks on Speed) // Cléa Vincent (Paris) // Dai Burger (NYC) // Derya Yildirim (Bln) // Dorit Chrysler (Graz) // Epiphany Now (Bln) // Elie Gregory (Bln) // Isabel Lewis (Dom. Rep/FL/ Bln) // Jessica Ekomane (Bln)//Julianna Barwick (US) // Leila Akinyi (Cologne) // Lyra (US/Bln) // Meredith Graves (Perfect Pussy - US) // Marisa Anderson (US) // Olimpia Splendid(FIN) // Saba-Lou (Bln) // Stella Chiweshe (Bln/Zimbabwe) // Vaginal Davis (L.A./Bln) 

Our three day conference will consist of workshops, talks, panel discussions masterclasses, sound art installations, and live performances, featuring a broad variety of internationally-known, genre-spanning artists. This event is designed to help individuals and groups develop their work and start new collaborations.

Our conference programme includes ... Media Takeover: Challenging the Status Quo // Feminist perspectives on music criticism // Women in journalism  // Artist career mapping: finding your story // Mental health and music workshop + panel // Parenthood and Music // Women in Music and Tech: Launch panel + Usability Workshop // GRRRL - What if women ruled the world? Women | Creativity | Activism | Change. // Migration Matters // Public Speaking Workshop // Financing creativity: key funders in conversation // Artist Talk: Meredith Graves // Theremin workshop // No Shade DJing Workshop // The Economy Of Praise: Language + Invisibility // German Politics in Music // Room4Resistance: Safer spaces // Salt+Sass Roundtable: the year in sexism // Physicality in music spaces // Artist Talk: Dai Burger // Music Therapy: alternative self-care practices // Roundtable: Build Your Own Tribe — Berlin Collectives 

Accompanying our live performance and conference programme, we will have after parties with more live performances and dj sets at ACUD!

DJ-Line-up: rRoxymore // kos_mic q'andi // PÍCARA - DJ team (Bodysnatch) // DJ Larry (Creamcake) // No Shade b2b Linnea // Hoe__mies // Room4Resistance

About We Make Waves

WMW's two primary goals are to build a community and increase visibility of female, trans and non-binary artists. We aim to empower individuals and unite existing groups, in the context of a progressive, feminist programme.

What We Need & What You Get

We’re aiming high with the quality of programming, materials, and international speakers and performers that we want to showcase in our first edition of We Make Waves. To meet our last few goals, we need your help.

We’re currently hoping to raise some extra funds to put towards additional equipment rental, materials, hospitality, flights and accommodation for our artists. The more help from you, the richer our programme will be! It’s that simple.

In exchange for your help, we offer our unending gratitude and a series of cool perks, like our beautiful new canvas tote bags, enamel badges, limited edition hand-screenprinted posters, and other fun things like some Sekt-soaked backstage hangs with us in November! 

We also have a range of sponsorship/partnerships options available — if you’re interested, please get in touch with us directly at info@wemakewaves.de

Other Ways You Can Help

We get it, money is tight, so if you can’t help us in monetary ways, don’t sweat it — you can help us just by passing on our message, or by volunteering, or even just giving us feedback on what we’re doing or your own hopes and wishes for this project and the future. We want to hear from you, so stay in touch! <3

 

The Impact

For our news, team, lineup, schedule and other info, find us online at:

www.wemakewaves.de!
facebook.com/wemakewavesbln
instagram.com/wemakewavesbln
open.spotify.com/user/wemakewavesfest

etc

Other Ways You Can Help
We get it, money is tight, so if you can’t help us in monetary ways, don’t sweat it — you can help us just by passing on our message, or by volunteering, or even just giving us feedback on what we’re doing or your own hopes and wishes for this project and the future. We want to hear from you, so stay in touch! <3


 


The Impact
For our news, team, lineup, schedule and other info, find us online at:
www.wemakewaves.de!facebook.com/wemakewavesblninstagram.com/wemakewavesblnopen.spotify.com/user/wemakewavesfest
etc
xx

story:
Short Summary

My name is Sean Hogan and for nearly a quarter of a century, I've been blessed to be able to make music my living. You could argue I've had some great success-- 20 years ago this month, I won my first CCMA, for 1997 Independent Male Artist of the Year; I have gone on to be nominated for and win several other awards for my song writing and singing and have had some great radio hits in Canada as well. In July 2015, I launched my first crowd funding project and completed it two years ago this month.  Now I am launching what I believe is my "comeback album", my 7th studio album with 11 new songs, with this promotional support campaign for branding videos and newest original music album. 

My last crowd funding project was successful with the release of “Best of” albums, Noteworthy" Volume Sun and Volume Moon, and gave back over $4,000 to the Canadian Cancer Society from combined affiliated concerts and the sale of fleece scarfs, "Neck Savers". (The name originated from my own experience with Stage 4 cancer which I was diagnosed with 6 years ago this month. This past spring marked 5 years cancer free from Stage4A carcinoma).  With this new project, I’m wishing to make two and maybe three new branding music videos finish my next studio album 7Come11, the first full collection of new music from me in 5 years.

Recently I wrote about Huatulco Mexico. A very generous individual who heard my song, and happened to have a business in Huatulco offered to bring me down to assist in making a music video of that song and to cover the cost of transport.  This is cool right!? Indeed very cool; however reality is that it takes more than that to make a video and finish my recordings for this new album. So in part that is what this project is about. I have an opportunity to go there to make these competitive branding music videos. Each video I have made in the past got picked up on national radio. Although there are many things that have changed over the years in the music industry, I believe that music videos still help fans and potential fans to get a sense of an artist's character, style, and breadth of music.  

So at this point, I am asking those supporters from two years ago and new fans I have met and made since, to please consider the fun opportunity to help me pick up where I left off two years ago.  This project is in motion and I'm excited to finish my new album and produce a few new music videos to support the success and completion of my next album.  I would love to have your support and the connectivity of you to my music and I eagerly invite you to come along on a good part of this journey. As a cancer survivor it's so nice to use the word "journey" for a change, in a proactive, fun and exciting way!

As an added bonus, there is an opportunity for some to be extras in one of these new videos such as the one in Huatulco if you're there at the time of shooting October 29th to November 5th. Other opportunities will also come later in first quarter of 2018, when I will be back down for some shows in Huatulco, Mexico and at which time we will likely have a contest for the winner of a trip to Huatulco to travel down.

 

 

What Is Needed & What You Get

So I've told you what I'm doing with any and all raised funds and why I believe I need to do this project to move forward.  I'm happy to discuss with anyone further details about why I am moving forward with this mission. That is should anyone wish to contact me for further conversation about the effects of being impacted by unemployment brought on by illness and or the world of being a full-time performing artist as opposed to being a part time musician and how being a recording and performing artist in the midst of one's career, in my case full-time singer/songwriter for the past 24 years. I welcome any questions you may have.

  • • Video production costs such as cameraman time per hour per video, (that's  Videographer/Director, Producer, Editor, Sound Engineer, Lighting Engineer, Performers, Make-up Artist, Studio Hire, Props, Costumes, coffee--lots of coffee, and maybe biscuits?... airfare for one video (not in Huatulco), fuel costs, rental vehicles, for technical crew cost such as labour fees, hourly rates for crew assistant personnel, equipment rentals and processing fees, prop and location associated fees, equipment shipping fees, etc.

    • Album costs include: studio hourly rates, engineer costs, co-producer fees, musician session fees, mix engineer and mastering fees, as well as any and all equipment rentals, transportation costs including air-fare costs and or vehicle rentals.

  • What You Get

    A chance to win a trip Huatulco and be an extra in the music video for my song "Huatulco", the *new album, and a number of great different perks that have been highlighted for you so please check them out!

The Impact

I fully anticipate that a major impact of my new music project will be to greatly assist my ability to reach out, reacquaint and indeed strengthen ties I had before my illness.  This will allow for booking opportunities in both foreign and domestic markets. Your contribution does not go into some general coffers’ account--it is specific to costs in this project critically needed for me to move forward. 

The regular shows I do for a living allow me to just get by covering basic living costs and this campaign is needed more than words can express to reactivate where I left off impacting people’s lives for the better with my own hybrid style of music. Having the ability for my music to change and better people’s lives has been behind all of the endeavours I have initiated over the years.  One such initiative is the Canadian Country Christmas concert series, now in its 14th year.  To date this has assisted countless communities across at least eight Provinces in raising funds for their own worthwhile charities and we have succeeded in raising over $200,000 for those organizations. In that time dozens of well-known Country and Roots recording artists have joined me across Canada each fall and we continue to do this to support essential community groups around their most important local issues.

 

Risks & Challenges

Surviving cancer and overcoming the myriad of challenges and obstacles in my career that seem to come with the territory of an independent artist, have made me a believer that perseverance and then talent are what gets one ahead.

Just to share one example from my career of why I hold this belief, I wrote a benefit song for the flood victims in Southern Alberta in 2013 "Hell or High-water" which was my 19th music video on CMT. Many, not all, Country stations thought the song wasn’t “Country” enough and as a result, truth be known, it didn’t get played all that much.  Despite that, we were able to nationally elevate the conversation around bettering conditions that First Nations face in Canada, and it did have an impact and make a positive difference

So I guess to sum up, I’m asking you to support my project and partner with me to continue to making the music and the difference I believe can happen from projects like this.

Other Ways You Can Help

Maybe you can’t contribute in a financial way and here are some other ways that you can help:

• Please share this campaign.  As a bonus, by doing so you will become eligible to win a free house concert and the new album when it's released.  Again, please share this campaign and share it often and greatly as there is a finite window of time to run the campaign to try and make this objective happen. 

Thank you my friends, and may good health find you reading this today.

And that's all there is to it.
