story:
Like the Burden of a Lullaby Music Video & New EP – Project by 

Equator & FilmsbyFine

“ Like the Burden of a Lullaby “ which is combine with one of the Japanese traditional singing style called “ Shigin - Ginyu ( Waka ) “ with electronica sound.


日本の伝統的な歌唱法、詩吟の歌い手とアンビエント- エレクトロニカサウンドのコラボレーションによる楽曲 Like the burden of a Lullaby ミュージックビデオプロジェクト



The traditional Japanese Singer Ms. Kyoko Sato who I have met her about 10 years ago in front of swimming pool near my place.

When I heard her singing first time I felt so much of the energy from her as a human being and I really moved !!!

It's very soulful and amazing, I can't explain how it is that well but I was really impressed so I asked her to make a song together and we made it.

約10年前偶然知りあった詩吟の歌い手 Sato さんの唄に今迄、それ程日本の伝統芸能に心動かされなかった自分の気持ちを一心させられ一緒に曲を作ろうとお願いし実現した曲です。



She had cancer at that time I suppose it makes her more soulful singer.

当時、癌との闘病生活をしていた状況がSato さんを更にソウルフルな唄い手にした。


Afterwards we released EP with the song in 2006 and it became one of the most unique song of our originals.

 2006年 -  Like the burden of a lullabyを含むEPをCD Babyからリリース。


We have been promoting our songs mainly with radio stations internationally and since last year 2014 we started promote our songs in “ Jango radio “ 

and we realized that the song “ Like the burden of a lullaby “ is still popular and people like it !! And we also still like it very much.

So we decided to make a Music video of the song and we can dedicate to her and tell the music lovers through the video that this is "  The New Japanese Ambient Pop tune" And for that   we need your support !!!!

Equatorは基本的にラジオをプロモーションを英語圏をメインにグローバルに展開している。

2014年から アメリカのインターネットラジオ Jango を介してのプロモーションは悪くない動きで1年半のプロモーション期間中約24500回以上のAir playと 世界中に300人以上のファンを Equatorにもたらし現在進行形である。

それらの動きの中で Like the burden of a lullaby は10年以上たった今でもリスナーを引き付けている事に気付き今回のビデオプロジェクトとリミックスバージョンのリリースに発展した。


1- We are going to make the video with Filmsbyfine from New York.

http://www.filmsbyfine.com/

2-We will shoot the video in a Shinto Shrine - Central area of Tokyo

2-1-  http://www.shimotakaido.org/hachiman/album/index.htm

2-2-  https://www.google.co.jp/search?q=%E4%B8%8B%E9%AB%98%E4%BA%95%E6%88%B8+%E6%B5%9C%E7%94%B0%E5%B1%B1+%E5%85%AB%E5%B9%A1%E7%A5%9E%E7%A4%BE&biw=1366&bih=643&site=webhp&source=lnms&tbm=isch&sa=X&ved=0CAgQ_AUoA2oVChMI-p6a4MWrxwIVAcKUCh3nSQkU&dpr=1

3 - We will have a gorgeous modern kimono Japanese dancer  

Her Stage name is Ena

http://joyauxdecoeur.chu.jp/profile.html#tokyo_ena

And She suppose to dance like this, maybe more deeper and darker in a good way!! 

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=puVy7gvmAUY

Anyway we really want to make a Great Music video with Taraditional Japanese singing and the culture and views.

So please help us and please BE A PART of “ New Japanese Ambient Song's Music Video Project “ !!!

WE REALLY WANT YOU TO SHARE THIS PROJECT WITH US!!!

Thank you so much ! Vielen dank, Muchas Gracias and Arigato ( ありがとう ) !!!

See you soon

ciao


そこでビデオ製作者を募り、ニューヨークのビデオクリエーター、先端的な踊りから伝統的な踊りまでこなす日本人女性ダンサー Enaさんと共に都内にある神社を背景に Like the burden of a Lullaby オフィシャルビデオを製作することになった。

もし自分もプロジェクトに参加したいと思った方は是非協力下さい。

協力して日本の詩吟- アンビエントミュージックビデオを世界にアピールしましょう！
宜しくお願いします。

Hideto Sei
Equator




Who are we

Hide has been performing his own electric sound since the age of 15. As a soloist, with acoustic guitar in hand and as Equator with producer and composing partner Shogo Uruno. But it is the recorded works of Equator that have reached listeners in Australia, America, England, New Zeland, Germany...and Japan.

Equator's music is mixed and inspired by an array of sounds from around the globe including such places as Mongolia, Japan, USA, Australia, UK, Argentina, Taiwan, Thai and Africa.

Hide sees his music as a form of communication. His greatest desire is to communicate with people everywhere, crossing and broadening culture all through the power of music.

As with Equator's song, Lake Baikal, produced by partner Shogo, Hide reflects that the song was inspired by h u m a n i t y ' s connection to the earth. It expresses a message that there is always the story of life, power and death, but remember Mother Earth. You can find this song's 2015 remix version on

Equator's latest EP “ Your Own Color “

Hide is joined on the CD ＆　This Great Music Video by talented guest musicians and singers and poets such as Shu Kosuge, Naoki,Elizabeth Szwarc, Alby Gardnerberg, Kyoko Sato, David Whitaker and Rachel Carvosso, Miguel De Diego, Katsutoshi Iwasaki, Kyoko Nakamura.........

Equator will soon have completed their first music video “ Like the burden of a Lullaby “ . Be sure to check it out! You won't be disappointed.

In the words of Hide, “ Ciao!”




What We Need & What You Get

Music Video & EP  Prerequisites 


To cover the costs of Shooting the video and Produce the EP we will need:

- Production Fee for a High quality Music Video    

                 

 - Fee for a Beautiful Kimono Japanese dancer & fashion & Kimono     coordinator
-Studio time - A quality of sound engineer for professional mixing  and  mastering
- Beautifully crafted artwork
- Video & the EP"s   Promotion fee for PR companies

  • In total we're looking at a minimum of 30 hours of recording time and 1 day video shooting with Japanese dancer and fashion coondinators We want our loyal listeners, friends, fans, and family to have radio quality recordings of the music and New style of Japanese - Asian taste of Ambient pop tune music video which we are going to make and continue to make ones.
  • If we don't reach our entire goal, we still LOVE you and thank you for your support! Whatever funds we receive will go towards the cost of studio & video production and our #1 goal - recording & sharing our music & video  & spirit with the world. 


The Impact


  • We have only a few Asian -  modern electronica  pop tunes in the world and this song could be very unique and it will give you nostalgic feeling of Japanese old era and the modern era at the same time. 
  • Here is the Equator's page from Jango radio, it shows you that we have got 297 fans in １ year and half and airplay over 24000 times and still growing!!!!
        http://www.jango.com/music/Equator?l=0
        and here is the review of our first EP and the " Like the burden of a lullaby "
         http://www.cdbaby.com/cd/equator


Risks & Challenges


  • It was very difficult to make songs with our stile ( Asian taste with Modern Electronica pop tune ) 
  • It's getting better  little by little because we are making " ORIGINAL SONGS " you know !!!! but sometime it's difficult to explain our style of music but at the same time I am kind of enjoy it nowadays!!!!
  • So we will  keep on Rock with our style No Matter Waht !!! Thanks & ciao 


Anyway Please help us Directly ( Best way )and Indirectly if you can't help us financially,  But still you can tell your people ( family, freinds, coworkers, Grandma your ex- boy friend....) that " Equator's Indiegogo ( Like the Burden of a Lullaby ) Music video project " it will help us a LOT!!!! You know that !!!!
story_txt:
Like
the Burden of a Lullaby Music Video & New EP – Project by 



Equator & FilmsbyFine









“ Like
the Burden of a Lullaby “  which is combine
with one of the Japanese traditional singing style called “ Shigin
- Ginyu ( Waka ) “ with electronica sound.

日本の伝統的な歌唱法、詩吟の歌い手とアンビエント- エレクトロニカサウンドのコラボレーションによる楽曲 Like the burden of a Lullaby ミュージックビデオプロジェクト


The
traditional Japanese Singer Ms. Kyoko Sato who I have met her about
10 years ago in front of swimming
pool near my place.
When
I heard her singing first time I felt so much of the energy from her
as a human being and I really
moved !!!
It's
very soulful and amazing, I can't explain how
it is that well but I was really impressed so I asked her to make a
song together and we made it.
約10年前偶然知りあった詩吟の歌い手 Sato さんの唄に今迄、それ程日本の伝統芸能に心動かされなかった自分の気持ちを一心させられ一緒に曲を作ろうとお願いし実現した曲です。


She
had cancer at that time I suppose it makes her more soulful singer.
当時、癌との闘病生活をしていた状況がSato さんを更にソウルフルな唄い手にした。

Afterwards
we released EP with the song in 2006 and it became one of the most
unique song of our originals.
 2006年 -  Like the burden of a lullabyを含むEPをCD Babyからリリース。

We
have been promoting our songs mainly with radio stations
internationally and since last year 2014
we started promote our songs in “ Jango radio “ 
and we realized
that the song “ Like the burden
of a lullaby “ is still popular and people like it !! And we also
still like it very much.
So
we decided to make a Music video of the song and we can dedicate to
her and tell the music lovers through the video that this is "  The New Japanese Ambient Pop tune" And for that   we need
your support !!!!


Equatorは基本的にラジオをプロモーションを英語圏をメインにグローバルに展開している。
2014年から アメリカのインターネットラジオ Jango を介してのプロモーションは悪くない動きで1年半のプロモーション期間中約24500回以上のAir playと 世界中に300人以上のファンを Equatorにもたらし現在進行形である。
それらの動きの中で Like the burden of a lullaby は10年以上たった今でもリスナーを引き付けている事に気付き今回のビデオプロジェクトとリミックスバージョンのリリースに発展した。

1- We are going to make the video with Filmsbyfine from New York.
http://www.filmsbyfine.com/
2-We will shoot the video in a Shinto Shrine - Central area of Tokyo
2-1-  http://www.shimotakaido.org/hachiman/album/index.htm
2-2-  https://www.google.co.jp/search?q=%E4%B8%8B%E9%AB%98%E4%BA%95%E6%88%B8+%E6%B5%9C%E7%94%B0%E5%B1%B1+%E5%85%AB%E5%B9%A1%E7%A5%9E%E7%A4%BE&biw=1366&bih=643&site=webhp&source=lnms&tbm=isch&sa=X&ved=0CAgQ_AUoA2oVChMI-p6a4MWrxwIVAcKUCh3nSQkU&dpr=1
3 - We will have a gorgeous modern kimono Japanese dancer  
Her Stage name is Ena
http://joyauxdecoeur.chu.jp/profile.html#tokyo_ena
And She suppose to dance like this, maybe more deeper and darker in a good way!! 
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=puVy7gvmAUY
Anyway
we really want to make a Great Music video with Taraditional Japanese
singing and the culture
and views.
So
please help us and please BE A PART of “ New Japanese Ambient
Song's Music Video Project “ !!!
WE REALLY WANT YOU TO SHARE THIS PROJECT WITH US!!!
Thank
you so much ! Vielen dank, Muchas Gracias and Arigato ( ありがとう
)
!!!
See
you soon
ciao

そこでビデオ製作者を募り、ニューヨークのビデオクリエーター、先端的な踊りから伝統的な踊りまでこなす日本人女性ダンサー Enaさんと共に都内にある神社を背景に Like the burden of a Lullaby オフィシャルビデオを製作することになった。


もし自分もプロジェクトに参加したいと思った方は是非協力下さい。協力して日本の詩吟- アンビエントミュージックビデオを世界にアピールしましょう！

宜しくお願いします。

Hideto Sei
Equator





Who
are we



Hide
has been performing his own electric sound since
the age of 15. As a soloist, with acoustic guitar
in hand and as Equator with producer and composing
partner Shogo Uruno. But it is the recorded
works of Equator that have reached listeners
in Australia, America, England, New Zeland, Germany...and Japan.

Equator's
music is mixed and inspired by an array of
sounds from around the globe including such places
as Mongolia, Japan, USA, Australia, UK, Argentina,
Taiwan, Thai and Africa.

Hide
sees his music as a form of communication. His greatest desire is to
communicate with people everywhere,
crossing and broadening culture all through the power of music.

As
with Equator's song, Lake Baikal, produced by partner Shogo, Hide
reflects that the song was inspired by h
u m a n i t y ' s connection to the earth. It expresses a message
that there is always the story of life, power and death, but remember
Mother Earth. You can find this song's 2015 remix version  on

Equator's
latest EP “ Your Own Color “



Hide
is joined on the CD ＆　This
Great Music Video by
talented guest musicians and singers and poets such as Shu Kosuge,
Naoki,Elizabeth Szwarc, Alby Gardnerberg, Kyoko Sato, David Whitaker
and Rachel Carvosso, Miguel
De Diego,  Katsutoshi
Iwasaki,
Kyoko Nakamura......... 


Equator will soon have completed their first music video “ Like the burden
of a Lullaby “ .  Be sure to check it out! You won't be
disappointed. 




In
the words of Hide, “ Ciao!”


   

What We Need & What You Get
Music Video & EP  Prerequisites 



To
cover the costs of Shooting the video and Produce the EP we will need:
- Production Fee for a High quality Music Video    

                 
 - Fee for a Beautiful Kimono Japanese dancer & fashion & Kimono     coordinator


-Studio
time - A quality of sound engineer for professional mixing  and  mastering

-
Beautifully crafted artwork

-
Video & the EP"s   Promotion fee for PR companies

In total we're looking at a minimum of 30 hours of recording time and 1 day video shooting with Japanese dancer and fashion coondinators We want our loyal listeners, friends, fans, and family to have radio quality recordings of the music and New style of Japanese - Asian taste of Ambient pop tune music video which we are going to make and continue to make ones.
If we don't reach our entire goal, we still LOVE you and thank you for your support! Whatever funds we receive will go towards the cost of studio & video production and our #1 goal - recording & sharing our music & video  & spirit with the world. 




    The Impact   We have only a few Asian -  modern electronica  pop tunes in the world and this song could be very unique and it will give you nostalgic feeling of Japanese old era and the modern era at the same time. 

 Here is the Equator's page from Jango radio, it shows you that we have got 297 fans in １ year and half and airplay over 24000 times and still growing!!!!

        http://www.jango.com/music/Equator?l=0

        and here is the review of our first EP and the " Like the burden of a lullaby "
         http://www.cdbaby.com/cd/equator

   
Risks & Challenges   It was very difficult to make songs with our stile ( Asian taste with Modern Electronica pop tune )  It's getting better  little by little because we are making " ORIGINAL SONGS " you know !!!! but sometime it's difficult to explain our style of music but at the same time I am kind of enjoy it nowadays!!!!
So we will  keep on Rock with our style No Matter Waht !!! Thanks & ciao 
   
Anyway Please help us Directly ( Best way )and Indirectly if you can't help us financially,  But still you can tell your people ( family, freinds, coworkers, Grandma your ex- boy friend....) that " Equator's Indiegogo ( Like the Burden of a Lullaby ) Music video project " it will help us a LOT!!!! You know that !!!!

story:
From the second half of the seventeenth century through the early eighteenth century, the French viol school is thoroughly documented with evidence in the form of surviving compositions, treatises, letters, iconography, and other primary source documents. However, there is evidence of a French viol school as early as 1529 at the court of King Francis I, with the first French treatise for viol published in 1589 by Claude Gervaise, as well as manifold iconographical sources. This early French viol school utilized instruments with five strings tuned in fourths throughout (none of which are extant), differing from those used in the contemporary Italian school and later French school, both of whom tuned their viols in a mixture of fourths and a major third, identical to lute practice. The French Consort Project, founded in Cleveland, Ohio by scholar-performer John Romey, intends to reconstruct a consort of these uniquely designed viols from the French Renaissance by utilizing all available established historical sources from treatises and iconography, and for the first time, identifying possible repertoire.

After a close collaboration with renowned luthier John Pringle that resulted in successfully reconstructing the largest-size rebec from Agricola’s consort of rebecs, the decision was made to form an ensemble consisting of some of the most promising young viol players available with interest in this unique project, procure funding for reconstruction of a four-viol French Renaissance consort, and begin to plan performances in major cities and universities across the Midwest and Northeast. The project currently hopes to pique the interest and gain the affiliation of more performers, which would enable concert tours and provide constant tactile input from different perspectives.

There are several goals contained within this reconstruction project: first, to create a dialogue between a knowledgeable and experienced luthier who is interested in experimentation and open-minded performers capable of providing useful feedback in regards to what “works” and what “doesn’t work”; second, to utilize the results of this dialogue, combined with surviving historical documentation, to learn what we as modern musicians can derive about performance practices from an era that has yielded no extant instruments; third, to ultimately revive rarely-performed repertoire by important French composers of the sixteenth-century, for the first time performed on the instruments modeled on those that were available in France at the time of composition; fourth, to present the results at academic conferences, create a series of educational lecture-concerts for the general public, and ultimately publish results in peer-reviewed academic journals.

John Romey has already delivered the fruits of this research at academic conferences. The papers examine the historical evidence of the early French viol consort, with particular emphasis on examining extant treatises dealing with instrumental technique and surviving iconographical sources, and reveals that the fantasies of Eustache du Caurroy (1610) and Claude Le Jeune (1612) could have been performed by a consort of these five-stringed early French viols. Methodologies employed to make this determination include examining the clef and range distribution in a variety of instrumental fantasies and comparing this data to the tunings and ranges provided in contemporary French treatises as well as examining the construction and relative sizes of the instruments present in iconography.

In 2013 John Pringle completed a prototype for the first viol in the consort (see the gallery for images of the prototype!), and it has gone through extensive testing. Over the past year, Mr. Romey has carried out archival research in France as a Fulbright Scholar and devoted time in the archives to The French Consort Project. The first fruits of the research for this project were published in the conference proceedings News from the Raven: Essays from Sam Houston State University on Medieval and Renaissance Thought. [“The French Renaissance Viol Consort: Reevaluating the Sources and Reclaiming the Music.” In News from the Raven: Essays from Sam Houston State University on Medieval and Renaissance Thought, ed. Darci N. Hill (Cambridge: Cambridge Scholars Publishing, 2014), 317-338.]. More information and scholarly research for the project can be found at: http://www.thefrenchconsortproject.com

story:
Introduction

Hello! I’m T.E. Yates. Welcome to my Indiegogo campaign!

Here’s a little about me and what I do. I am a singer-songwriter, musician, artist and animator. I play guitar, harmonica, mandolin, banjo, ukulele and musical saw. I sing and I write songs.

I’m inspired by a huge amount of music covering an eclectic range of styles and genres and I hope that this diversity is apparent in my songwriting.

I also draw, paint and animate. I'm pleased to say that my first completed animated work "Evil Cat" was shortlisted for Best Music Video at the 2016 British Animation Awards.

About the Album

My band and I are ready to embark upon the recording of my first full length studio album, titled "Silver Coins and White Feathers". This will be my biggest and most ambitious project to date and I’d like to offer you the opportunity to firstly help make this record possible and secondly to ensure that its release is a success.

This album will be a follow up to my debut release, 2013’s "Possessed EP". Once again the record will be released and distributed through Manchester label Debt Records.


My band, who are a bunch of highly accomplished and thoroughly professional musicians, have dedicated a great deal of time in order to learn and rehearse the material which we’re going to record during the album sessions.

Whilst plenty of new material will be included on the album, some of the songs we plan to record have been staples of my live set for a long time. It’ll be wonderful to be able to finally commit these songs to record, including "Burning Bungalow", "Mystery Window" and "Orion's Belt".



My regular band members (excluding yours truly) are:

  • Sarah-Jane Pearson - Vocals
  • Fran Lydiatt - Keyboards/Accordion
  • James G. Wilson - Electric Guitar
  • Al Grundy - Trumpet
  • Tom Cleghorn - Vocals/Clarinet/Guitar/Percussion
  • Matt McNicholas - Drums/Percussion
  • Dan Owens - Electric Bass/Double Bass
Media Machine will be the leading single from the album. A video has already been made for this song - in fact I’m currently making animations to overlay on top of the footage.

Here's a complete list of the songs we'll be recording during the album sessions. Not all of these will make the album - those that don't will be offered as an exclusive download for backers prior to public release:


We’ll be recording at the brand new WR Audio studios near Manchester. I’ll be resuming working with Biff Roxby, of WR Audio and Debt Records, who single handedly produced, engineered and mixed "Possessed EP".

Biff, operating as both a musician and engineer, has worked with a range of artists including Elbow, BC Camplight, Maps & Atlases and John Otway in addition to all of my label mates at Debt Records. I’m confident that Biff will produce the album to a high standard and that we’ll emerge with a really strong record.

In order to complete the sound of the album as it is envisaged by both my producer Biff Roxby and I, it will be necessary to call upon some specially skilled session musicians, since certain songs require additional instrumentation, including fiddle and pedal steel guitar.
 

Goals

Let’s take a quick look at the objectives I’d like to achieve with this project:


And now let's see how that total sum of £7,000 is broken down (images will brighten as the respective targets are met):

What if the full amount isn’t raised?

Well, I’ll make do with whatever I’ve got! This isn’t an all-or-nothing campaign and I retain all the funds that I make (although Indiegogo deduct a modest 5% fee from the total amount raised). Of course, it goes without saying that the more money I’m able to invest in this project, the stronger the recording, the better the products and the bigger the promotional effort will be.

Rewards

Now let’s take a look at some of the incentives.

I’m offering a variety of rewards in the form of different packages and goodies, such as:

  • Copies of the album on CD and 12" vinyl
  • Exclusive bonus material
  • Limited edition poster of the album artwork
  • Original artwork based upon an image or idea of your choosing
  • Concert in your house
  • Introductory lesson to a musical instrument of your choice

Names of benefactors who contribute £10 or more will be printed within the album’s liner notes as a personal thank you to those who helped to make this record possible.

Please feel free to browse through the perks on offer. Be sure to check back as I'll be introducing some unique (and sometimes unusual) rewards throughout the campaign!

Risks & Challenges

If my campaign target isn’t met then I’ll have to scale back my ambitions to the bare bones, but I’m determined to create my first album come what may.

Should insufficient funds be raised in order to commission musicians then my first LP will become a more limited, possibly solo, effort.

If not enough money is generated to press copies of the album on CD and 12" vinyl then, for the time being, it'll be distributed as a digital only release. To compensate for the lack of a physical product, I can offer some exclusive bonus songs recorded during the sessions, draw/paint original artwork or I can come and do a gig for you. I promise that we'll work something out and that I'll do my best to press the album on both CD and vinyl in the future!

Whilst essential to attaining coverage on national radio, major publications and popular music blogs, hiring a press agency naturally carries a certain amount of risk. This is because there are no certainties: even the most dedicated, enthusiastic, experienced and trustworthy PR person can't guarantee results. That's why this is my lowest priority. Rest assured, Debt Records and I will be putting a lot of work into promotion irrespective of whether or not this is in conjunction with an independent press agency.


Thank You!

I must stress that everything I’ve achieved to date has often been done with no money at all and occasionally with a shoestring budget. I firmly believe that a little funding would make a huge difference, hence why I’m running this campaign.

It’s an ambitious project and one which I would like to invite you to help fulfil. I’d be extremely grateful if you would help this project to realise its potential and achieve my goals.

If you can't contribute financially but would still like to help out, please feel free to share the campaign link on social media (you can give me a shout out via my Facebook and Twitter profiles and of course by sharing the link to this Indiegogo campaign).

Thank you for your time!


Links

T.E. Yates on the interwebs:

Website

Facebook
Twitter
SoundCloud
 Bandcamp

Label, Studio and Producer:

Debt Records
WR Audio
Biff Roxby

Additional footage courtesy of:

Noomi Spook/Strawberry Corpse
Andrew AB
Debt Records

Photos of T.E. Yates and band by:

Ben Robins
Nicola Jaye/MCR Photographer

This agreement introduces and establishes the Earth Cooperative. A global co-op that gives every human-being free and equal share of all resources, democratic decision making power and distribution of profits.  This can essentially be considered a form of Universal Living Wage or Basic Unconditional Income, as these would be the natural results of a truly thriving global economy.  Begin imagining now which product you would like to see humanity collaboratively agree to purchase, or which corporation you would like to see humanity cooperatively acquire, potentially re-purpose, and share with one another.  Imagine humanity purchasing all their basic needs from a single company owned by all people, infinitely leveraging solidarity in purchasing power and economy's of scale.  In this context, competition quickly evolves to innovation as oppose to a fight for survival.

First Example of Circular Solidarity Economics:
Would you like to see 1 billion people agreed to each invest $1/year towards cooperatively acquiring one company that represented a technological breakthrough in sustainability which replaces almost everything made of plastic, wood and fiberglass with a material made 100% of water and cellulose?  (Cellulose is what all plant matter is made of, and there is literally trillions of dollars worth of it being burnt or thrown away every year.)
What if 1 billion people agreed to purchase a single pen made out of this material, for the sake of symbolizing the Pen being mightier than the Sword....  Would you agree to do the same?
We could even name that Pen: Excalibur ;)

That company is called Zeoform.com.  It's Your Company!

Second Example of Circular Solidarity Economics:

Imagine all those who are for world peace each agreeing to purchase one bag of organic, non-gmo, heirloom hemp seeds per month. This could be done by cooperatively acquiring a global hemp seed company or forming a new company.  In any case, this single agreement literally forms the largest hemp company in the world.  This would obviously be horizontally and vertically integrated, meaning we would cooperatively own all the hemp farms (through land stewardship), and use the entire hemp plant to make zeoform, clothing, and everything else that hemp can be used for.  Consider that when 1 billion people have united, by simply agreeing to purchase one shirt from our own company, we form the most successful clothing company literally over night.  The only monopoly that should exist is the one which all of humanity owns equally.   This obviously leads to humanity forming solidarity economics around telecommunications, sustainable energy, salt, water, and generally everything related to society.

This will become a monthly summit held simultaneously in every major city.Achieving World Peace and All 17 United Nations Sustainable Development Goals:These Agreements represent an open source research curriculum know as "The Science of World Peace" which will be engaged with and plugged into all corporations, organizations and educational, political and religious institutions so as to educate on and facilitate consensus reality perspectives as unanimously agreed upon action plans for peace.The World Peace Disclosure Summit will highlight humanity’s most voted up responses to each agreement.Soon The Realization That All Of The Solutions To Humanity's Most Pressing Issues Already Exist Will Be Absolutely and Irrefutably Obvious To Everyone .Unity through Simplicity equals  Critical Mass and The Tipping Point to that Realization.This Formula is an immediate pathway to illuminating all the solutions and then financing all the  visionaries who advocate and pioneer them. Through the spontaneous unification & mobilization of humanity around the greatest and most obvious agreements, we Wage World Peace. The first phase of this campaign simply invites humanity to support unification around the basic exploration of these key agreements. Once unity has been achieved around these irrefusable agreements, the second phase invites everyone to nominate, vote up, illustrate and actualize all other greatest agreements which unity can be leveraged towards.Humanity's First Unanimous Peace Agreement Is The Greatest Unanimous Peace Agreement, As It Unveils The Infinite Leverage of Unified Intent.That being said, the First of these Five Agreements is The Greatest Agreement Humanity Could and Would make; and because it is absolutely Irrefusable, it becomes the Ultimate Litmus Test of Truth which will initially divide Humanity into two categories:1. Those who say yes.2. Those who have yet to say yes.* The Implications of this Statement may take a while to be fully recognized.This is Judgement Day, and you are the judge and the judged.The moment 144,000 angel philanthropists have simply said YES to even the first of these agreements, we will have the attention of all those who are for world peace. What could be more powerful, on a tangible and actionable level other than all those who are for peace and unity standing in solidarity around a single agreement, recognizing that unity around the first agreement guarantees unity around the rest? This first phase of unity will insure the response from all the most prominent Humanitarians, First Nations Elders, Philanthropic Billionaires, Nobel Peace Prize Laureates and World Leaders.  It's time for all those who are for peace and unity TO UNITE. This is about the formation of the greatest Global Super-Movement in human history.  These Five Greatest Agreements actualize a collective commons revolving around circular and solidarity, resource based economics.  This involves the highest level of transparency, accountability, open collaboration which humanity can fathom.  From decentralized global self-governance systems, to the holistic and sustainable stewardship of Earth’s resources around natural law and indigenous and traditional stewardship methodologies.Imagine a database of shared intelligence involving open source blueprints and tested solutions for the creation of thriving eco-communities everywhere.OPEN SOURCE EVERYTHING.These agreements instigate the Cooperative 5th Industrial Revolution which happens through the cooperative acquisition of all major industries via the leverage of solidarity in purchasing power.Put Simply: These agreements represent the liberation, emancipation, collective-self realization and Collective-Self Actualization of Humanity.  :) We invite you to take a pause and really feel these words.Are you open to the possibility that this is true, and that what you are about to finish reading is exactly that.  Lets us repeat it.These agreements represent the liberation, emancipation, collective-self realization and Collective Self-Actualization of Humanity.  :) In Essence, this is about the Flowering of Human Consciousness.*Below the 3rd Agreement we also introduce a technological breakthrough in the form of a new and abundant, 100% sustainable natural resource which not only replaces almost everything made from plastic, fiberglass and wood, but also represents an ideal medium for a global solidarity economy which templates how a collective commons can holistically and sustainably steward all of Earths resources. Non only that, but it leverages the millions of tones of plant waste that is either being illegally burnt or stock piled by multiple industries in every country.*These Five Mission Dependent Agreements represent the greatest and fewest agreements humanity Would Have To Make so as to seamlessly transition from a paradigm of fear, separation and scarcity to a paradigm of Love, Collaboration and Abundance. What is The First and Greatest Yes or No Agreement?
Would You Like To See All Those Who Are For World Peace United Around The Exploration Of The Greatest Agreement Which Humanity Could And Would Unite Around, For Creating The Greatest Amount Of Prosperity And With The Greatest Speed And Grace, While Empowering Everyone?Yes Or No?Imagine a local and global open database with 2 categories listing:All those who have said YES, and all those who have not yet said yes,and all those who have been most nominated to respond. Imagine every Mother And Father, Student And Teacher, Ceo, First Nations Leader, Nobel Peace Prize Laureates, Wealthy Philanthropist, Organization, Corporation, Foundation, Union and Institution publicly responding to this single question.* Imagine everyone having access to a public database which lists which people, organzations and corporations have and have not said yes.Phase one of this campaign simply invites humanity to say Yes or No.Would you like to see this happen in and of itself?  ;)  Thy Will Be Done.Phase two of this campaign invites everyone (including all organizations, corporations, political parties and political and religious leaders) to nominate their own three greatest agreements which they feel humanity could and would unite around. Would you like to see this happen in and of itself?  ;)  Thy Will Be Done.Each person and organization will also be invited to nominate three of the greatest agreements which speak to the solutions which their organization is advocating.Would you like this to occur?  Don't you feel like this initiative should already exist? :) What is The Second Greatest Yes or No Agreement?
Would You Like To See All Those Who Are For World Peace Pledge The Equivalent Of $1usd Per Month Towards A Scholarship Program Focused On Exploring And Illustrating The Implications Of Humanity’s Most Nominated Peace Agreements?  Yes or No? This agreement establishes the Peace Legacy Institute with centers in all 196 countries, bringing the brightest and most creative Change Makers together in collaboration, so as to survey, explore and actualize humanity’s most nominated agreements.Imagine being able to search through a database of humanity's most nominated agreements and the discussions which unfold, as well as being able to search through and assess all the agreements nominated by humanity's most prominent leaders...What would be the 3 greatest agreements which the Dalai Lama would advise humanity to consider?What about the President of the USA, or Leonardo Dicaprio? or Vandana Shiva? Or Julian Assange?  Or the Pope?What would be the top 3 most voted up agreements by all members of the Buckminster Fuller Institute, or by all those who have signed The Giving Pledge?In any case, by simply presenting them all with the opportunity to respond to these agreements, everyone will come to realize that these are in fact the greatest agreements. (As you too will also come to realize).It is important to keep in mind that these agreements inspire everyone to think past imaginary national borders and fragmented perspectives. What is The Third Greatest Yes or No Agreement?Would You Like To See All Those Who Are For World Peace Agree To Purchase One Ethical And Sustainable Product Per Year From One Company That Is Owned By Everyone Equally, Where All Revenues Are Distributed Between The Scholarship Program, As Well As Online And Offline Basic Needs Access Centers Everywhere?  Yes Or No? This agreement introduces and establishes the Earth Cooperative. A global co-op that gives every human-being free and equal share of all resources, democratic decision making power and distribution of profits.  This can essentially be considered a form of Universal Living Wage or Basic Unconditional Income, as these would be the natural results of a truly thriving global economy.  Begin imagining now which product you would like to see humanity collaboratively agree to purchase, or which corporation you would like to see humanity cooperatively acquire, potentially re-purpose, and share with one another.  Imagine humanity purchasing all their basic needs from a single company owned by all people, infinitely leveraging solidarity in purchasing power and economy's of scale.  In this context, competition quickly evolves to innovation as oppose to a fight for survival.First Example of Circular Solidarity Economics:Would you like to see 1 billion people agreed to each invest $1/year towards cooperatively acquiring one company that represented a technological breakthrough in sustainability which replaces almost everything made of plastic, wood and fiberglass with a material made 100% of water and cellulose?  (Cellulose is what all plant matter is made of, and there is literally trillions of dollars worth of it being burnt or thrown away every year.)What if 1 billion people agreed to purchase a single pen made out of this material, for the sake of symbolizing the Pen being mightier than the Sword....  Would you agree to do the same?We could even name that Pen: Excalibur ;)That company is called Zeoform.com.  It's Your Company!Second Example of Circular Solidarity Economics:Imagine all those who are for world peace each agreeing to purchase one bag of organic, non-gmo, heirloom hemp seeds per month. This could be done by cooperatively acquiring a global hemp seed company or forming a new company.  In any case, this single agreement literally forms the largest hemp company in the world.  This would obviously be horizontally and vertically integrated, meaning we would cooperatively own all the hemp farms (through land stewardship), and use the entire hemp plant to make zeoform, clothing, and everything else that hemp can be used for.  Consider that when 1 billion people have united, by simply agreeing to purchase one shirt from our own company, we form the most successful clothing company literally over night.  The only monopoly that should exist is the one which all of humanity owns equally.   This obviously leads to humanity forming solidarity economics around telecommunications, sustainable energy, salt, water, and generally everything related to society. What is The Fourth Greatest Yes or No Agreement?
Would You Like To See All Those Who Are For World Peace Invited To Nominate Three People Onto Their Local And Global Wisdom Council Of Women, Men, Youth And Elders, Who Would Present Their Greatest Question, Agreements And Critical Analysis Regarding The Peer Review Of This Formula And The Actualization Of This Entire Project?
 Imagine everyone in your local community nominating a minimum of 12 integral people who they feel has a significant level of expertise regarding all issues mentioned in this campaign, and thus making up everyone's ideal advisory council for the dialogue which follows.  The key here is to raise the level of humanity's awareness on all topics so that everyone can feel that they have the ability and know how to engage in all matters than involve and influence their lives.This is how we empower humanity and unleash the infinite power of public wisdom.  What is The Fifth Greatest Yes or No Agreement? Do You Want To See All Of Those Who Are For World Peace Pledge A Specific Amount Of Money Towards Incentivizing The Unification Of A Specific Number Of People Around These Agreements? ;)  Yes or No? This Agreement introduces the Receiving Pledge.Humanity's Collective Response To The GivingPledge(The Giving Pledge is a Campaign formed by Bill & Melinda Gates and Warren Buffet which has so far united 150+ Philanthropic Billionaires who have each officially and publicly pledged to donate a majority of their wealth towards humanitarian efforts in their life time.) The Receiving Pledge irrefutably illustrates the greatest opportunity for that wealth to be fully leveraged as it Insures Global Unity around the Greatest Agreement with a money back guarantee, as no money would even be transferred until after unity has occurred.  And if that's not enough, after unity has occurred, the first agreement made by the people could be for everyone to pledge $1/person and pay back the billionaires original pledge. (Or $1.50) ;) We Repeat, This means Global Unity is Guaranteed.   Thats Right!  We Just Hacked World Peace Through Global Unity.  Take a few moments to digest that. "Whatever You Incent Will Happen"~ Elon Musk  (Giving Pledge Signee)(Take a few moments to digest this as well)To be specific:  If each of the 150+ giving pledge billionaires agreed to each donate $10 million towards incentivizing the unification of 1 billion people around even the first 2 agreements, a monthly Billion dollar scholarship program will have been created which translates to 500,000 monthly scholarships each worth $2,000/month.This same agreement could go towards incentivizing one billion people agreeing to each donate $1/day towards all of the most obvious solutions for immediately feeding, clothing and sheltering local people in need.We Repeat: No money would even be transferred from the billionaires until after "1 billion people" had agreed to donating $1/month or even per day towards the scholarship program.This is the Ultimate Legacy Project for any billionaire, and especially the first billionaire to support this. GLOBAL UNITY ONLY HAPPENS ONCE.The first billionaire guarantees the rest.  The First Domino.The First Millionaire and the first Billionaire will have created their Legacy as the ones who guaranteed Global Unity with a single decision. Now you know. There is no forgetting.YES, We just hacked philanthropy and capitalism for the greatest good of all.So, are there any millionaires out there who would like to see all of the worlds billionaires united around the Receiving Pledge? ;) (Also keep in mind that most of the Giving Pledge Billionaires have 10-50 billion dollars.Just $1 billion guarantees the unification of humanity. Will You Be The First Millionaire?Will You Be The First Billionaire?Thy Will Be Done.This Entire Campaign creates a One World Dialogue which databases and explores the greatest questions and challenges which could arise during the process of actualizing this vision by bringing together the most integral thought leaders to explore them.In actuality, the moment this formula is validated by a few humanitarian luminaries, the news will be heard around the world, and nothing will be the same again.And just to let you in on a little secret, in the case that it hasn't been made obvious. One of the main reasons why this scientifically irrefutable formula is in fact irrefutable is simply because all refutations that could possibly be conceived are literally part of the process which this formula invokes.  This is because when dealing with scientific and philosophic irrefutability, the peer review dialogue is the actualization process.Just imagine a global database which allows every person on the planet to contribute and vote through a live-stream exploration of all nominated agreements.  This simple process inevitably leads to the illumination of humanity's Agreeable Agreements. This includes all the most nominated questions explored by the ever expanding global peer review team. All of this will be done through the utilization of the most advanced and integrity driven methodologies and technologies for insuring absolute transparency, accountability and open collaboration in an entirely equal opportunity forum/platform.  (See The Future Now) for more details.Simply Put: It is obvious that the most inclusive agreements will Win.We are about to realize Humanity’s First Unanimous Agreement… One World YES!It is inarguable that humanity would desire to agree to create the greatest amount of prosperity, for the greatest number of people, and with the greatest speed and grace.We can create this opportunity NOW. We invite all of humanity’s most prominent humanitarians and wisdom keepers to respond and share their testimony and feedback. With Great Honor,-  LOVE   The Roll Out Process:$144,000 will insure that the mainstream acknowledgement of this revelations existence.  That being said, the fastest way to invite all of humanity to respond to these agreements is by simultaneously launching a $144,000 campaign from within all 196 countries.  This amounts to $28,224,000.  There is no reason why doing so could not unite at least 28,224,000 (144,000 x 196) humanitarians each agreeing to invest $1/month towards the scholarship program which facilitates the national peer review/survey/dialogue.This would equal to $338,688,000/year worth of scholarship funds.(9,408 Monthly Scholarships each valued at $3000)(or 50,000+ Monthly Scholarships if made available in a country like India)The first year of progress would surely prove the value of everyone investing $1/day.Thats 144,000 people x 196 countries x $365/year.This would equal to a scholarship fund of $10,301,760,000/year and billions more in philanthropic donations and social impact investments. During the first 6 months we will surely have received a response to all 5 questions by all of humanity and united everyone into one of the two categories. (It is important to recognize that having everyone actually pledge the money is not the main thing.  The money is in fact just a symbol within this global thought experiment. This is because by the time 1 billion people have responded to these questions and recognized the power in our unity, the follow through will be inevitable as it will be irresistible)That being said; One choice we could all make now is to invite everyone you know to participate in the peer review process, including all nobel peace prize laureates, billionaire philanthropists and world leaders so as to unite all of humanity by the end of the year. ;)The First Version of This Unity Based Thought Experiment can be found on the Facebook Group "The Greatest Agreement."Call To Action:This is a clarion call to 144  and/or 1000 critically minded visionaries from each country who will officially commit to participating in the peer review process for validating this formula, and upon validation will commit to each raise $1000  and/or $144 towards launching this campaign.This Peer Review Process quite simply involves each participant agreeing to:- Respond to each of the Greatest Agreements- Present your greatest critical analysis- Respond to all feed back given by other participants regarding your analysis- Provide your testimonial regarding the implications you perceive would result when all 500+ million cultural creatives unite around these agreements.The First $144,000 will go towards bringing together a team of 36 visionary entrepreneurs who will develop this campaign which discloses the existence of this scientifically irrefutable world peace formula to humanity, while developing the scholarship program which facilitates humanity's One World Dialogue.We repeat.  The One World Dialogue IS the Peer Review Process.The Greatest Realization We Can Make Regarding This Disclosure Is Realizing That The Greatest Agreement Has Indeed Been Realized. (Beware of Cognitive Dissonance).This first team of 36 visionaries will live and work under one roof (Location to be confirmed), (Potentially in Bali, Indonesia; Crete, Greece; and/or Hawaii, USA), while broadcasting a live-stream, open, round-table discussion which involves all of humanity to be included and engaged with throughout the entire co-creative process. The first phase of this campaign will focus on:- Creating the campaign template which will be used for uniting and financing all international teams in all 196 countries who will then launch their own nation wide campaign, in their own language, insuring that all people are invited to respond to the five agreements and engage in One World Dialogue.- Inviting all the most prominent humanitarians, organizations and social movements to respond to the "survey" containing the 5+ agreements, provide their peer review feedback, testimony, engage in the dialogue, and support the scholarship program.- Uniting 144,000 people who will each agree to micro-sponsor this scholarship program at $1/year, month and then per day.- Co-create a website, survey and multiple RSA styled videos for illustrating the vision in multiple formats so that it can be easily understood by a demographically diverse audience, spanning all cultures and age groups.- Engage with all humanitarians so as to nominate, explore, map and illustrate the top 10  greatest and most voted up agreements which solve each of the 17 United Nations Sustainable Development Goals, as well as Economic Slavery. ;)Each team of 36 Social Architects will include experts in the following categories:- Project & Campaign Managers- Corporate Shamans/Business Strategists/Social Entrepreneurs- Animal, Environmental and Human Rights Experts- Alliance, Partnership Experts and Non-Violent Dialogue Facilitators- Accountants, Grant Writers and Fundraising Experts- Natural Law, Sovereignty Lawyers- Local, National & Global Multi-Sector Peace Ambassadors/Liaisons- Event and Volunteer Coordinators- Global Village/City Hall 2.0 Technologists- Media Creators and Broadcasters- Web Developers, Programmers and Graphics Designers- Whole Systems Designers/Permaculturists- Eco-Sustainable Architects- Outreach and Social Media teams- Integrative Nutritionists, Therapists and Raw Vegan ChefsThe first $144,000 will be raised by:- 12,000 people each donating $12, or by:- 1000 people each donating $144, or by:- 144 people each donating $1000, or by:-  12 people each donating $12,000In either case, the goal of this first 3 month process will be to unite 144,000 humanitarians who agree to each donate $1/month or day from all 196 countries towards the scholarship program so as to prove the model. Once this is done the world will not be able to deny or ignore the feasibility of this model.
To be considered as one of the first 144 scholarship recipients, you are required to invest a minimum of $1000 to this campaign. (This could easily be done by identifying 10 people who each agree to donating $100).
To be considered as one of the first 1000 scholarship recipients, you are required to invest a minimum of $144 to this campaign. 
The scholarship program will offer a minimum of $3000 worth of room and board.
Individual scholarships may continue indefinitely, based on merit and public support.
Together we will sponsor the most visionary humanitarians, so as to map, finance and execute the greatest and most obvious solutions for achieving all 17 of the United Nations Sustainable Development Goals.  Full Disclosure:  One billion cultural creatives uniting most certainly means a unanimous decision to activate our own global debt free currency, a Global Debt Relief Program  (Jubilee) and the End of Centralized Governance, and Centralized Banking based on Usury, Fiat Currency and Inflation.  Well that escalated quickly.... :) Perhaps we can afford world peace and the transcendence of money now, because simply put, counting money is the smoking gun of scarcity mentality.Long Story Short: Centralized Banking Based on Usury = Scarcity Economics and Economic Slavery.  The Peace Legacy Institute will tell the story which all governments should have already done with a hollywood blockbuster budget.  This will be done through an Open Global Research Project regarding the History of Banking, Colonialism, and Predatory Capitalism as designed systems which perpetuate Scarcity. This is a story of how we move from Deceive, Divide and Conquer to Illuminate, Unite and Prosper.   From Corporatism to Cooperativism, Contributionism and Volunteerism.The Co-creation Process:
Host the online peer review process by inviting all the worlds thought leaders to self organize around panel discussions and roundtable meetings by choosing their own ideal 1+ hour time slot on an open google doc calendar. Humanity can nominate the matchmaking process of the ideal peer review teams on a day by day and month by month basis.This will also turn into live-streamed, audience driven, match making round-table summits, where all conversational topics and participants can be nominated by the public.All parties interviewed will be invited to not only respond and discuss the implications of the 5 greatest agreements presented in this campaign, they will be offered an opportunity to present at least one agreement which they feel humanity could and would unite around for creating the greatest amount of prosperity with the greatest speed and grace.
A database of all those who have said yes to the single greatest agreement, all those who have not yet said yes. and all those who have been most nominated to respond.Imagine a list of the most nominated people and corporations who have not yet responded.  Imagine one category for all world leaders, where humanity can clearly see each of their ability to think in contexts which a minimum transcend borders and at maximum compare to the impact that the "Mission Dependent Agreements" could have.

A database of all sponsors and collaborators nominated wisdom council members.Imagine a list of all the most nominated youth and elders within all local communities.

An ever evolving Questions and Answers Database which initially covers all topics related to a critical analysis of this entire campaign and all that is being declared as possible. This of course turns into a Universal Database where all the most relevant and potentially controversial topics are discussed and all answers are voted on, based on a variety of metrics. For Example:   What Is The Greatest Conspiracy?!  ;)    Spoiler Alert:  You have infinite potential and direct access to source. ;)
As far as conspiracies go, one need not look any further than the manifestation of fear throughout history in the form of colonialism and the monopolized industries of big pharma, big war, big banking and big meat, big media, big religion and big government.The manifestation of fear can easily be portrayed as the eye that misses the forest for the trees, for we could all be living like eco kings and queens if we could only see the infinite potential of love and cooperation.  Fear and scarcity mentality have an ironic way of blinding one from love and abundance.  The key has been in the palm of our hand the whole time.  That being said, there is an infinitely larger group of men and women whose soul purpose and mission in life is to create world peace by exploring the infinite potentials of love, permaculture, sustainability, community and collaboration for the greatest good of all. Those who have caught a glimpse of loves awesome power have the ultimate "inside story".We recognize that the "Apocalypse", which is transpiring right now is specifically about the illumination of humanity's individual and collective shadow and the unveiling of all things that were once hidden.  (See Wiki Definition)  Things are not necessarily getting worse. The corruption, suffering and lack of integrity is simply being illuminated for all to see.  Individually and collectively.  Inside and out.There are hundreds of millions of beings who are conspiring for humanity by going within through prayer and meditation, so as to remember who they truly are, as the Light at the end of the tunnel.  We are the ones we have been waiting for.This Campaign is about the Greatest Conspiracy For You.There is nothing and will never be anything as powerful as Love.Not just as a fuzzy emotion, but as a actual frequency which allows for obvious truth to be illuminated before your eyes.  The vibration of fear is how deception works.  Through fear, we can easily fool ourselves into believing the silliest notions. Love is what the very fabric of reality which allows the gift of contrast to exist.This is why we need not spend hardly any time looking backwards, if only to realize how far we have come. Its time to set sail on the shortest path to world peace. Life Can Be Divided Into Two Categories:The Nature of Reality & The Objects In Reality"When You Change The Way You Look At Things, The Things You Look At Change."- Wayne Dyer The Cat Is Out of the BagThe Genie Is Out Of The LampThis Campaign = Checkmate to the Old Paradigm(A Forgiveness Campaign as Fear & Scarcity's Greatest Exit Strategy)
It Is DoneWe Did ItAnd You Were Right All Along#WorldPeaceDisclosure#TheEarthCooperative#PeaceLegacyInstitute#TheGreatestAgreement#TheReceivingPledge#OneWorldDialogue#OneWorldYES#GlobalUnity#SimplicityEconomics#CircularEconomics#SacredEconomics#ResourceBasedEconomics#WagingWorldPeace#BuyTheBanks#BuyTheGrid#ItIsDone#WeDidIt#YouWereRightAllAlong#SaveTheHologram#HolographicSingularity#HeavenOnEarth#Revelation#JudgementDay#Apocalypse#TheGreatestNews#TheCosmicJoke#HolographicMicDrop#CHECKMATE***Please Note***This Campaign Is Version 1 and will continuously and co-creatively evolve so as to be easily understood by a larger and larger audience. The second version of this campaign is already being developed and translated into every major language Database of Ideal Collaborators: (Just A Glimpse)1. Singularity University2. Bioneers3. Buckminster Fuller Institute4. Esalin Institute5. Pachamama Alliance6. Skoll Center7. The Zeitgeist Movement8. The Venus Project9. Ethereum Project10. Bit Nation11. One World In Dialogue12. Giving Pledge13. Nexus Youth Summit14. Club Of Budapest15. New Earth Nation16. World Service17. The Shift Network18. Transformatonal Leadership Council19. Evolutionary Leaders20. Earth Guardians21. Thrive Movement22. ConsenSys23. Guaana24. World Peace One25. Mother Earth Trust26. Parliament of World Religions27. Unify28. KAICIID29. Institute of Noetic Sciences30. Ubuntu Planet31. The Stupa of the Great Awakening Project32. Earth Charter33. Declaration of Human Rights34. Declaration of Seed Freedom35. B Corporation36. One Nation Wampum Treaty37. Constitution of the Free Nations (Sovereign Unity Organization)38. Two Row Wampum Treaty39. Treaty to Protect and Restore Mother Earth ***All Individuals, Religions & Political Institutions, Political Parties, Organizations, Foundations, Corporations, Unions, Cooperatives, Social Movements, Royal Families and Indigenous Communities Are Invited to Collaborate In ThisOpen, Global, Multi-Sector Survey/Consensus Forming Curriculum. ***
Database of Supportive Information:
1. General Outline: The Earth Cooperative Open Source Enterprise Architecture (Website)2. Platform Cooperativism (Article)3. Abundance is our future | Peter Diamandis  (Video) 4. Empowering Public Wisdom by Tom Atlee (Book)5. World Peace Disclosure (Under Construction)6. Zeitgeist 3: Moving Forward (Video) 7. Where Are We Going (Video) 8. Where Are We Now (Video)9. The Choice is Ours   10. Why we should give everyone a basic income | Rutger Bregman  11. Ordinary Love (Music) 12. Koan Sound - Sanctuary

story:
Rock 'n' Roll Dream started as a graduate school video project and has grown into a collaborative idea more in tune with the needs of independent musicians. Rather than simply watching and documenting musicians pursuing their dreams, Rock 'n' Roll Dream will now be able to assist musicians in realizing their Rock 'n' Roll Dreams through a membership site which will be a place to foster connections with each other, music industry professionals, and fans as well as promote themselves and their music.

After self-funding the original video project as well as the research and development of the Web site, we needed to take the concept of the membership site public and raise the funds necessary to complete it sooner with the help of other Rock 'n' Roll Dreamers.  That's where you come in.  Whether you donate or share our campaign, we need your help to make Rock 'n' Roll Dream a reality.

For those donating, we are kicking off the campaign with a great set of perks, including being listed amongst the Rock 'n' Roll Dream Roll Call of Dreamers and exclusive tickets to our Rock 'n' Roll Dream Launch Party. For those looking for more perks, we'll be adding "one-of-a-kind" perks throughout the campaign that include rock 'n' roll and music industry memorabilia and collectibles.  It will pay to come back to the Indiegogo campaign often to see how we're doing as well as find out what new perk has been added.

Rock 'n' Roll Dream is managed and produced by Corner Office Media Group, LLC, a California corporation.  The three partners in Corner Office Media Group bring their own areas of expertise and enthusiasm for Rock 'n' Roll Dreams to the company.  http://www.cornerofficemediagroup.com

We hope you'll join us in launching Rock 'n' Roll Dream!

Thank you from the Rock 'n' Roll Dream Team - LM, Scott, and Tony

PS: Make sure you click on the PERK you want to purchase to ensure you get the item! If you only click the pink BACK IT button, you are donating with no PERK included. THANK YOU!

story:
http://www.thehuttoproject.com/

The Hutto Project aims to assemble a children's choir within an emergency refugee camp in Berlin. Together, we will compose an original choral work unique to our group, which will premiere in a public concert this Spring.

This project is motivated by a belief in the transformative, healing, and regenerative power of arts education, and its profound and lasting impact on young people.

The Watermill Center provided us with a research residency, and The American Academy in Berlin will be hosting us this Spring.

Our project is named in memory of Benjamin Hutto, 1947-2015.


What We Need & What You Get

(1) Tangible Rehearsal Necessities

For our rehearsals, our choir will need:

  • music folders
  • binders
  • pencils
  • some instruments - xylophones, tambourines, drums, etc.
  • safe transportation, to and from rehearsals
  • snacks
  • water
  • a translator
  • uniforms!

These are the basic necessities that your contributions will fund, for which we are so grateful.

(2) Documentation of Our Work

Documentation, in the form of MP3 recordings, pictures, and film, is the largest expense of this project, and in many ways the most important.

I believe these kids deserve to walk away from all of their hard work with tangible copies of what we made together. I also believe their families, other volunteers, audience members, and *you* deserve this too, for every valuable contribution.

It is a very delicate and difficult project to document, and this must be done with the utmost sensitivity and care. We have gotten some incredibly intelligent and talented people on board to do just that:

Brune Charvin, filmmaker, will be creating a documentary about our rehearsal process.
http://www.charvinbrune.com/

Lucas Alvarado Farrar & Simone Varano, filmmakers and photographers, will be coming from New York to document our rehearsal process with photographs and film.


www.HowWeLiveDoc.com
www.WhoseStreets.com
http://www.farfetchedfuture.com/portfolio
http://hxhour.com/About

Thorsten Hoppe, Sound Engineer who has worked with the Berliner Ensemble and Robert Wilson, will be recording our MP3s to the highest quality. 

I will be recording our expenses for the project on our website as they come, so interested contributors can see what stage we are at and when.

Perks

Any contributor will be thanked on our website and in our concert program.

$20 donors will get a personalized card.

$50 donors will get a personalized card and a CD of our work.

$100 donors will get a personalized card, our CD, and a tote bag!

$250 donors will get a DVD package of our documentary, our CD, a tote bag, and a personalized card.

$500 donors will get a framed picture, a DVD package of our documentary, our CD, a tote bag, and a personalized card.

$1000 donors will get an Honorable mention at the concert, a framed picture, our DVD package, our CD, a tote bag, and a personalized card.

$10,000 donors get round-trip tickets to Berlin, front row seats at our concert, and dinner with our creative team.

story:
For english, please scroll down and see italics

Hintergrund
Alpen Klezmer - Zum Meer!

Bayrisch * jiddisch* wuid und koscher

Für das wegweisende Projekt „Alpen Klezmer“ wurde ich mit dem Deutschen Weltmusikpreis ausgezeichnet, habe nun die koscheren Gebirgsjodler ins Reisebündel gepackt und ziehe mit meinen weiteren musikalischen Forschungsreisenden über die Alpen. Wir wildern, wie und wo es uns gefällt und schmuggeln Lieder über den Brenner auf der Suche nach Jiddischland bis man nicht mehr weiß, ob Obergiesing nicht doch in Italien liegt. Wir ziehen weiter und weiter, der Sehnsucht nach, die die Richtung, aber nie ein Ziel vorgibt. Wild und rau geht's zu, aber auch sanft und beseelt. Jodler verschmelzen mit Nigunim, italienisch-jüdische Peysakh-Lieder treffen auf bayrische Flüsse und das murmelnde Rauschen des Meeres gibt den Takt dazu.

Ich bewege mich seit 30 Jahren in der jiddischen Musik mit unterschiedlichsten Projekten. Vor etwa 5 Jahren reifte in mir die Idee, mich musikalisch auch meinen bayrischen Wurzeln zu widmen. Im Spannungsfeld zwischen Tradition und Innovation entstand daraus ein neues Genre: Alpen Klezmer. Ich reiste damit von Schleswig-Holstein bis in die Alpen, von der Eifel bis in den Bayrischen Wald und von Bulgarien bis New York.

Zum Einspielen der Lieder hat sich eine illustre Auswahl an Musikern der Klezmerwelt und alpenländischen Musikwelt eingefunden, um gemeinsam, in das große Abenteuer einer einzigen große musikalische Ekstase einzugehen. Unter anderem hat der Grammy-Gewinner und Sänger der Klezmatics den weiten Weg auf sich genommen, um mit ins Studio zu gehen, aber auch Ex-Biermösl Stofferl Well war wieder mit dabei. Das Lineup, findet ihr, wenn ihr weiter nach unten scrollt.
Eure Unterstützung hilft mir dabei folgende Kosten zu decken: Studio, Mischen, Mastern, Aufnahmehonorare der Kollegen, Pressematerial und Promoclip.


Lineup:

Alan Bern -Flügel, Kinderklavier, Akkordeon

Johann Bengen - Aufnahme, Mix, Gesang

Miene Costa - Stepptanz, Gesang

Szilvia Csaranko - Flügel

Christian Dawid - Klarinette, Saxophon, Gesang

Davide Casali Eschmann  - Gesang

Hansjörg Gehring - Posaune, Gesang

Anja Günther - Klarinette

Alex Haas - Kontrabass

Hermann Haertel jun. - Geige, Gesang

Evi Heigl - Geige, Gesang
Loni Kuisle - Gesang
Guy Schalom - Schlagzeug, Percussion, Palmas
Ilya Shneyveys - Akkordeon, Ukulele, Glockenspiel, Gesang
Lorin Sklamberg - Gesang
Michel Watzinger - Hackbrett
Stofferl Well - Trompete, Harfe

Die Folgen

Wie schon bei der ersten Alpen Klezmer-CD geht es mir nicht nur darum, zwei musikalische Volksmusiktraditionen mit einander zu kombinieren. Vor vier Jahren war es mir ein großes Anliegen, die gemeinsamen Wurzeln jiddischer und bayrischer Volksmusik aufzuzeigen und dadurch darauf zu verweisen, dass wir alle auf einer tiefen menschlichen Ebene miteinander verbunden sind. Ganz nebenbei und gar nicht in erster Linie geplant, hat sich dadurch ein neues Genre entwickelt, nämlich "Alpen Klezmer".  Die Stadt München hat mir dafür den Volkskulturpreis "Innovationen" 2012 verliehen und 2014 erhielten Ilya Shneyveys, mein musikalischer Partner, und ich den "Deutschen Weltmusikpreis" des TFF Rudolstadt. Der Erfolg war fast überwältigend, denn damit hatte ich in dieser Form nicht gerechnet. Selbstverständlich habe ich mich sehr über die Anerkennung gefreut und bin sehr glücklich, diese Preise erhalten zu haben!

Alpen Klezmer "Zum Meer!" geht einen Schritt weiter. Die Fusion der beiden Stile, sprachlich, musikalisch, auf Makro- und auf Mikroebene, hat es mir ermöglicht, eine eigenständige künstlerische Sprache zu entwickeln. "Zum Meer" ist ein wichtiger Schritt dahin, diesen Weg weiterzugehen. Die Unterstützung der Kollegen, nicht zuletzt die Unterstützung durch Alan Bern, aber zweifelsohne auch euer Zuspruch bei Konzerten, ist sehr wichtig für mich. Durch euch bekomme ich die Kraft, meine Stimme gegen Hass, Neid und Missgunst zu erheben und mich weiterhin für eine friedliche Welt einzusetzen. Klingt pathetisch? Ist aber genauso!

Ich bin fest davon überzeugt, dass wir nur dann eine friedliebendere Welt schaffen können, wenn sich die unterschiedlichen Kulturen offen und mit Neugierde begegnen und sich gegenseitig ihre Schönheiten zeigen. Nur so erkennen wir uns selbst im Anderen und identifizieren uns letztendlich mit dem, was anfangs sehr fremd und bedrohlich erschien.

Ich hoffe, dass meine Arbeit euch in eurem Alltag dazu inspiriert, Haltung zu zeigen, Ausgrenzung entgegenzutreten und Partei zu ergreifen für die, die ihre eigene Stimme nicht hörbar machen können. Und natürlich kommt hoffentlich jede Menge aufregende Musik dabei heraus, die Herz und Hirn beschwingt und das Tanzbein zucken lässt.



 

Was du uns gibst & was du bekommst


Um alle noch anstehenden Unkosten zu decken, benötige ich 10.000€. Das ist sehr viel Geld. Das sind: Studio, Mischen, Mastern, Aufnahmehonorare der Kollegen, Pressematerial und Promoclip.
Als Gegenleistung erhaltet Ihr u.a. eine CD, ich backe für euch, Grammy-Gewinner Lorin Sklamberg,  der ein begnadeter Koch ist, kocht ein ganzes Abendessen für euch, ihr könnt euch mit mir auf jüdische Spurensuche in der Münchner Stadtgeschichte begeben, ich komme auf euer Fest und jodle mit euren Gästen, wer mag kann eine Gesangsstunde bei mir nehmen oder bekommt zwei Eintrittskarten zum CD-Release in München. Es gibt viel auszuwählen - sucht euch einfach das Passende aus! 


Risiken & Herausforderungen

Bitte beachtet, dass ich für mich selbst kein Honorar nehme, sondern ausschließlich nötige Ausgaben durch eure Unterstützung gedeckt werden.
Jede CD-Produktion ist für einen freischaffenden Künstler wie mich nicht nur ein künstlerisches, sondern vor allem auch ein finanzielles Abenteuer. Zwar wird die CD bei Galileo MC im November 2016 erscheinen und einige Ausgaben bleiben mir dadurch erspart, aber dennoch muss ich viele Unkosten selbst decken. Um möglichst unbeschadet aus dieser Unternehmung  hervorzugehen, benötige ich dringend eure Unterstützung! Ich hoffe, in der ersten "Sammelrunde", die  5.000 € zu erreichen. Falls mir das gelingt, werde ich weitersammeln, und  so hoffentlich alle Unkosten über die Crowdfunding-Kampagne abdecken.
Andere Wege, wie man helfen kann

Falls ihr mich im Moment nicht finanziell unterstützen könnt, könnt mir dennoch auf andere Weise helfen. Erzählt  anderen Menschen von dieser außerordentlichen CD oder teilt den Link in euren sozialen Netzwerken oder auch hier auf Indiegogo. Danke schön!

====================================================

Background
Alpen Klezmer – To the Sea!

Bavarian *Yiddish* Wild and Kosher

Having been awarded the German World Music Prize for the groundbreaking Alpen Klezmer project, I have crammed my kosher yodellers into my knapsack and am heading over the Alps to Italy. We’ll be roaming wherever we please, smuggling songs over the mountain passes in search of Yiddish Land until no one will be sure if Munich isn’t in fact somewhere in Bella Italia. As always, we’ll follow our heart wherever it takes us, but who knows exactly where? One thing’s for sure – it’s going to be wild and raw as well as tender and soulful. Yodellers will embrace Nigunim, Jewish Italian pesach songs will blend with Bavarian ballads, and all this to the backing vocals of the warm, lapping waters of the Mediterranean. 

I’ve been involved with Yiddish music for about 30 years now, working on a whole range of different projects. Then about 5 years ago, I started to get more and more interested in my Bavarian musical roots. And the result of this has been the creation of a new genre - Alpen Klezmer - which I have taken on tour not just through the length and breadth of Germany, but all the way from Bulgaria to New York.

An illustrious line-up of performers from both the Klezmer and Bavarian scenes has come together in an ecstatic celebration of this great musical adventure. We’ve had the great good fortune to be joined by a Grammy award-winning vocalist from the Klezmatics who has come all the way from New York to record with us. We also have the incredible trumpeter and harpist Stofferl Well, famous for his virtuoso performances of Bavarian folk music in the band Biermoesl Blosn. The complete line-up can be found below. Your support will help me to cover the following costs: studio hire, mixing and mastering, musicians’ fees, press material and our promotional clip.

Line-up:

Alan Bern – grand piano, toy piano, accordion

Johann Bengen - recording, mixing, vocals

Miene Costa – tap dance, vocals

Szilvia Csaranko - grand piano

Christian Dawid - clarinet, saxophone, vocals

Davide Casali Eschmann - vocals

Hansjörg Gehring - trombone, vocals

Anja Günther - clarinet

Alex Haas - double bass, vocals

Hermann Haertel jun. - violin, vocals

Evi Heigl - violin, vocals

Loni Kuisle – vocals

Guy Schalom - drums, percussion, palmas

Ilya Shneyveys - accordion, ukulele, glockenspiel, vocals

Lorin Sklamberg – vocals

Michel Watzinger – dulcimer

Stofferl Well - trumpet, harp

What next?

As on our first Alpen Klezmer CD, I’m not just concerned with the musical aspect of combining two great folk traditions. Four years ago, it became extremely important to me to make people aware of the roots that Yiddish and Bavarian folk music have in common and to show that we are all connected at a deep human level. It was almost by chance and quite unexpectedly that this new genre came into being. I was fortunate enough to be awarded the Munich prize for cultural innovation in 2012, and then in 2014 my musical partner Ilya Shneyveys and I received the German Prize for World Music. I had never expected this kind of recognition and am overwhelmed by the success of the project! I’m absolutely thrilled to have won these awards!

The Alpen Klezmer To the Sea! project takes everything a step further. The fusion of the micro and macro levels of both styles, both linguistically and musically, has made it possible to develop a unique artistic language, and To the Sea! is a vital stage in this new journey. The support of all my colleagues, not least that of Alan Bern, and also your enthusiastic response to concerts, mean such a lot. They give me the strength to speak out against hatred, envy and resentment and to do all I can to contribute to a peaceful world. That might sound a bit cheesy, but it really is incredibly important to me.

I am firmly convinced that we can create a more peace-loving world if we open ourselves to other cultures with a spirit of curiosity, and a desire to share the beautiful things which each of us has to offer. Only in this way can we find ourselves mirrored in the eyes of others and learn to identify with what at first can perhaps seem alienating and threatening.

I hope that my work can inspire you to have the courage to stand up against marginalization, and to speak out for those who don’t have a voice of their own. And of course there will also be an enormous amount of fabulous music which will touch both hearts and minds, and get everyone up on the dance floor as well!


What you can give us, and what we can give you in return

In order to cover all the costs involved, I need €10,000 for the studio, the mixing and mastering, the musicians‘ fees, press material and our promotional clip. That’s a lot of money.

What I can offer in return includes a free copy of our CD, I can bake for you, Grammy-winner and truely gifted chef Lorin Sklamberg will cook a whole dinner for you, or I can show you the traces of Jewish life on a tour of the historic city of Munich. I can come to your parties and yodel for you and your guests. I can offer you singing lessons, or two tickets to our CD release event. There’s a lot to choose from – just tell me what I can do for you!


Risks and challenges

I want to make it clear that I myself will accept no fees for this CD and that all funds will go exclusively towards production costs.

The production of a CD is not only an artistic adventure for an independent artist such as myself – it also involves considerable financial challenges. Galileo MC, who are bringing this CD out in November 2016, will cover certain costs but there is still a lot for me to finance out of my own pocket. To help me come out of the project relatively financially unscathed, I urgently need your support! I hope to collect €5,000 in the first “round”, and if I manage that, then I’ll go on collecting until hopefully all costs have been covered through the crowdfunding campaign.

Other ways you can help

If you aren’t able to support the project financially at the moment, there are other ways to help. Tell other people about this extraordinary CD, or add a link to your social media networks, or add one here on Indiegogo. Thanks a million!
